title: Sales Recruitment & Development Asst. Manager
description:
AIA is hiring for Sales Recruitment & Development to support and developing recruitment strategic, hiring plans, selection tools to improve the quality of manpower

Role & Responsibility :

Drive the full spectrum of recruiting and selection activities
Create and implement sourcing strategies for pro-hiring
Design and drive the adoption of consistent recruiting, interviewing and hiring practices that support a strong candidate experience
Partner with leaders within the organization to track ongoing hiring needs of their business
Manage end-to-end recruitment for pro-hire roles
Define and lead projects focused on continuous improvement
Oversee and develop strategies to improve our recruitment initiatives
Regularly review man power mapping & analyze general report to identify any recruitment improvement opportunities and maintain the quality of the selection process
Work closely with respective designated channel to identify: total current manpower shortfall, roll out planning & manpower requirement, turn over prediction
Maintain and select appropriate vendors around Indonesia to carry out the selection process, include: negotiate with vendor, prepare addendum and contracts, Carry out all administration and vendor payment processes
Deliver analytical and comprehensive regular data analysis of the distribution performance – both partner and internal sales level.
Job Requirement :
A Bachelor's degree from a renowned university
Min 5 years of experience working alongside recruitment area and/or data analyst in a dynamic and fast-paced environment
Excellent project management skills with great speed and accuracy
Experience in implementing & managing recruitment-related data and reporting applicant tracking systems, and direct sourcing tools
Better have experience in handling third parties related to recruitment
Strong problem solving and stakeholder management skills
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills with high empathy
High adaptability and open-mindedness to changes
Passion for people and the advancement of the business beyond keeping things BAU (i.e. business as usual)
Experience in Microsoft Office (Excel), and Spreadsheets
Excellent verbal and written communication skills, English is required
Great active-listening skills

title: Data Science Manager - Global FMCG Brand
description:
Join a well-known multinational company and chance for international exposure|One of the FMCG top players in Indonesia that embraces diversity and equality


About Our Client

A well-known multinational company and acknowledged as one of the biggest FMCG players in Indonesia.

Job Description

Develop the strategy for the assigned domain(s)/solution(s) and contribute to the development of the strategy on a/one level higher, in line with the Business & DTA strategy
Develop an operational plan for the appointed domain(s)/solution(s), taking user needs and business objectives into account; as well as the predefined strategy one level higher, and, ensure the implementation within time and budget.
Co-create solutions (next to business key users), and policies taking user needs & business objectives into account.
Advise clients in terms of fully understanding their business problems and deriving a fitting solution. Furthermore, develop and/or execute an adoption & training plan for the solution derived
Generate, in cooperation with others within and outside FrieslandCampina, ideas for innovation, translate viable ideas into plans & execution
Explain and convince internal parties beyond content-driven arguments; also appeal to interest, culture, and level of others. Successfully implement medium complex changes.
Has advanced technical knowledge related to the job role. Proactively shares ideas and insights across the team.
Design strategy for analytics products from pilot to rollout
Integrate digital analytics data with traditional data sources & build predictive models to target the right customers.
Responsible for executing diagnostic & predictive analytics based on both big data analytics and providing dashboards to speed up decision making
Work with other departments to translate the technical analysis into a commercial discussion
Coach and provide advice related to career growth and planning for junior data scientist
Build capabilities for Data Science teams to effectively develop Data Science solutions within the OpCo.
Share knowledge and information of analysis techniques and data coding with other staff and train, if needed

The Successful Applicant

University graduate
4+ years of working experience and relevant track record working in dynamic environments of which at least 3 years of experience working as a data scientist or data analyst.
Excellent understanding of machine learning techniques and algorithms and experience with common data science toolkits
Advanced analytics - Market mix modeling, Price elasticity, forecasting (360 Marketing)
Experience in R/ Python with machine learning/ Neural network algorithms
Experience using business intelligence tools
Proficiency in using query languages such as SQL
Accurate overview of digital sales & marketing solutions
Strong communicator to various levels as well as business departments
The ability to empathize with creative, technical, and business needs, and balance these against considerations of time and cost
Has expert technical knowledge (statistical models and data science techniques) and broad knowledge of all business processes.
Able to translate & communicate the complicated ML model to non-technical users.

What's On Offer

The empowerment to explore consumer good business from Analytic side
Part of a multinational company that embraces diversity and equality
Chance to seize your ambitions and build your career, having the opportunity to grow
Competitive benefits

Contact: Clairine Lonteng

Quote job ref: JN-012022-4580076

title: Manager Customer Experience Hospital Regional West
description:
Manager Customer Experience Hospital Regional West

Deskripsi Pekerjaan

JOB RESPONSIBILITIES
1. Customer Service Standards
Create, implement, evaluate, and develop patient service standards in accordance with the company's vision, missions and business targets as well as observe the patient's needs/expectations.
Ensuring every clinical operations employee to be able to carry out patient service standards and appearance standards set by the company.
2. Customer Experience for VIP Client
Collaborate with the Commercial Department to manage accommodation (planes, hotels, pickup cars, etc.), doctors consultation schedule and others for foreigners / VIP patients.
Ensuring VIP Client Specialists to serve foreigners / VIP patients according to patient service standards.
Handling patient complaints, especially foreigners / VIP patients satisfactorily.
Maintain good relations with patients, especially foreigners / VIP patients, not limited to reminding the next schedule, following up on patients Drop Out, and giving more attention to patients such as congratulate patients birthday, and others.
3. Customer Satisfaction Index
Create, implement, evaluate, and develop Customer Satisfaction Survey.
Collaborate with Sub Section Data Analyst to yield Customer Satisfaction Indes report.
Follow up on customer satisfaction survey results through new programs / development of patient service standards.
JOB QUALIFICATIONS:
Candidate must possess at least Bachelor's Degree in any field.
Solid Experience in Planning and Implementing Service Blueprint in Service Industry such as Hospital, Hotel, and Tourism.
Multitasking and Service-Oriented.
Willing to Travel for Business.
Required language(s): English in oral and written.
Fluent in Mandarin will be an advantage.
Strong communication and interpersonal skills.
Patient, empathetic, and a great sense of responsibility in problem-solving.
Diplomacy, tact, and poise under pressure when working through customer issues.
Self-motivated, proactive team player with innovative ideas to inspire customer loyalty and adoption.
Report to General Manager Operational.

title: Marketing Researcher
description:
Marketing Business Researcher

Surabaya, Indonesia

About Super

We are a group of business enthusiasts, scientists, communicators, designers, productive mothers and many more who are unified and unduly spirited to work towards one big vision and goal. As a leading social commerce platform in Indonesia, we aim to solve economic inequality distribution across rural areas by building agent networks and hyperlocal supply chains to make goods more affordable. Aplikasi Super goes beyond the passion and creativity to decipher social issues among our surroundings.

Key Responsibilities
Conduct market research projects and provide high-impact quality control of the research input, process, and output
Analyze data on e-commerce market landscape and consumer behavior obtained from external trackers and market research
Develop reports that compile data and insights from various sources
Evaluate and build hypotheses from the data trends
Carry out quantitative or qualitative research
Remain fully informed on market trends, other parties researches and implement best practices
Present research findings, analysis, and business recommendations to senior leaders
Capabilities
At least 1 - 2 years experience as Market Researcher / Data Analyst
Analytical thinker with strong theoretical and research proficiencies
Comprehend and interpret competitor strategies and consumer behavior.
Simplify complex information into a user-friendly format.
Able to gather large amounts of data and convert it into meaningful analysis.
Join Super

At Super, we are continuously providing equal, unparalleled opportunities across various business operating pillars from operations, commercial, and technology for all candidates from diverse types of background and expertise.

If you are someone with high passion towards delivering innovative work as part of your extraordinary career, committed to self-integrity, enjoy working collaboratively, and ready to work in an agile environment, you are very welcome to apply. You will also have tremendous opportunities to hone your functional skills and expertise in an area of specialization. The sheer variety of work we do, and inherent experience of creating meaningful social impact it offers, provide an unbeatable platform from which to build a fulfilling career.

#GabungSedulurSuper and help solve Indonesia’s unequal economic distribution.

title: Performance Marketing Manager
description:
As Performance Marketing Manager, you will be responsible to onboard and oversee clients’ digital marketing offering. This is an outstanding opportunity to build and manage key relationships with both internal and external stake holders and become a go-to person in digital marketing strategy, media planning, and optimization. In your role you will be expected to provide holistic advice to clients on our digital offering based on their objectives and ambition. Success in this position require having broad knowledge in marketing such as Google Search, Facebook Advertising, Instagram, Social Media, and Chat. Also having an understanding of how platform like Tokopedia, Lazada and Shopee works is vital to your role.

In this crucial role you will be expected to be top-notch in marketing and work closely with both Business Development and Brand Management teams to understand customer requirements. A key component is to be able to work closely with various internal and external departments including, but not limited to, Brand Managers, Digital Marketing Specialist, Production, and Operation to ensure smooth execution and planning for your marketing campaign. We look for candidate who enjoys solving problems and building new initiatives. This position will be based in Jakarta, Indonesia.

Responsibilities
Setting up, managing, and optimizing campaigns to drive awareness and acquisition across e-commerce marketplaces, SEM, display, social media and affiliate marketing
Run performance-based advertising to increase brand awareness, promote products campaigns or services and to drive prospects to conversions
Analyze, strategize, operate, manage, and report performance marketing channels for clients (inc. ecommerce ad platforms)
Work closely with Account Managers to synergize ads & store campaigns
Manage revenue delivery and budget spend, including daily optimization and providing real time targeting recommendations
Create A/B testing frameworks and implementation to ensure consistent growth
Manage Analytics and performance report sharing with clients, advising them on optimization potential
Minimum Qualifications

Who We Look For – The Ideal Profile
Background in Data Analyst, Data Scientist, Performance Marketer (FB Ads) from ecommerce or from enablers, and business developments are welcome to apply
Have a strong logic and comfortable with numbers, excels, and analytical skills
Willing to go the extra mile
Extensive knowledge of Adwords or e-commerce Marketplace Search Ads
Able to communicate and write English with confidence
Strong understanding of major advertising success metrics

Desired Skills and Experience
Google Analytics, Facebook Ads, Digital Marketing, Data Analysis, Data Interpretation

title: Performance Marketing Manager
description:
The Role
We are looking for a Performance Marketing Manager based in Indonesia, who can drive forward our marketing services as a critical part of Intrepid’s overall business. This person will own the relationships with a variety of our leading Brand partners, manage best-in-class digital marketing and execute campaigns that are aligned with our clients’ objectives and help them seize the full potential of ecommerce-driven digital marketing. The role will cover brands across multiple markets in Indonesia.

Marketing Services include paid performance marketing & ecommerce platform ads and packages.

Requirements:
- Bachelor Degree
- Minimum 2 years of relevant work experience in digital marketing. Experienced in client handling is a plus.
- Strategic and analytical to develop data driven recommendations to clients
- Professional level for written and spoken English
- Thrive in a fast-paced high growth start-up environment
- Data analyst/ data scientist/ Performance Marketer or have worked in enabler or media agency company previously is a plus

Responsibilities
- Setting up, managing, and optimizing campaigns to drive awareness and acquisition across e-commerce marketplaces, SEM, display, social media and affiliate marketing
- Run performance-based advertising to increase brand awareness, promote campaigns or services, and drive prospects to conversions
- Analyze, strategize, operate, manage, and report performance marketing channels for clients (inc. ecommerce ad platforms)
- Work closely with Account Managers to synergize ads & store campaigns
- Manage revenue delivery and budget spend, including daily optimization and providing real time targeting recommendations
- Create A/B testing frameworks and implementation to ensure consistent growth
- Manage Analytics and performance report sharing with clients, advising them on optimization potential

title: Global Lead Marketing Innovation and Analytics (Bangkok-based, relocation provided)
description:
About Agoda

Agoda is an online travel booking platform for accommodations, flights, and more. We build and deploy cutting-edge technology that connects travelers with more than 2.5 million accommodations globally. Based in Asia and part of Booking Holdings, our 4,000+ employees representing 90+ nationalities foster a work environment rich in diversity, creativity, and collaboration. We innovate through a culture of experimentation and ownership, enhancing the ability for our customers to experience the world.

Get to Know our Team:

The Performance Marketing Team of Agoda is a world leader in online marketing. This department is highly data-driven and focused on developing at-scale marketing programs that improve the lifetime value of Agoda customers through measurable marketing programs and channels. The team is a blend of the best analysts, marketing strategists, and data scientists in the world. The marketing leadership at Agoda have deep experience in data science, product, strategy, and other marketing fields and have built an organization that thrives on data, creative ideas, and technology. The Performance Marketing Team also fosters a great learning environment. You will be able to learn and grow by working closely with experts from a variety of backgrounds from all over the world.

In this role, you’ll get to:

Take ownership of analytical projects end to end from extracting and exploring data, generating hypothesis, building a structured analysis, and rigorously evaluating methods and results
Provide analytical and valuable insights for decision-making support for key projects and management
Work closely with various business functions to identify opportunities, analyze, and interpret trends or patterns in complex data sets using different techniques and tools such as R studio or Tableau
Communicate findings and propose actionable recommendations to address the problems

What you’ll need to succeed:

Bachelor Degree in Computer Science/Statistics/Math or Engineering or Economics and Finance
5+ years in Data Analyst position or otherwise in projects involving big data
People management and strong commercial acumen
Proficient in business intelligence tools and data warehouse i.e. SQL, Tableau and MS Excel
Must be data savvy and love crunching numbers
Strong analytical and statistical analysis skills in order to extract insights and recommendations
Fluent in English with strong communication skills (both written and verbal)

It’s great if you have:

Experience in R studio, data modeling, hypothesis testing is a plus

title: Senior Financial Analyst, Aurea Software (Remote) - $60,000/year USD
description:
Crossover is the world's #1 source of full-time remote jobs. Our clients offer top-tier pay for top-tier talent. We're recruiting this role for our client, Aurea Software. Have you got what it takes?

In a typical data analysis role, you get thrown into heaps of unstructured data and expected to find an insight without any guidance or process to follow. If you are a financial analysis expert who excels at using data to answer critical business questions, we propose a different approach.

Aurea offers bold solutions for the future of work, commerce, and IT through 30+ software products. We offer an “Unlimited” plan that allows customers to access our always-growing library of solutions for a single price. The sheer number of products and customers means we generate plenty of data, so we need skilled financial analysis to distill that data into actionable insights.

Forget about ad-hoc problem solving and messy datasets. Aurea has developed well-established frameworks and data structures that enable you to focus on generating insights, not cleaning up data. In this role, you will evaluate different data strategies and support decisions with quality data, delivering business value every day.

If you are excited about taking your analytical skills to the next level, apply today!

What You Will Be Doing
Creating high-quality dashboards and reports that uncover business opportunities
Translating business requirements into data requirements, selecting the most appropriate models for data analysis
Ensuring data quality by finding issues, proposing solutions, and breaking down data silos
What You Won’t Be Doing
Solving ad-hoc problems or firefighting. You will have a well-established scope and process for your analysis and will not be solving random issues.
Senior Financial Analyst Key Responsibilities
Uncover valuable business insights and opportunities through data analysis
Basic Requirements
Accounting, Finance, Economics, or Math/Science degree
3+ years of experience working as a data analyst within a multinational company
2+ years experience working as a financial analyst or equivalent
Proficient with SQL, Python, Excel/GSheets, and data visualization tools such as Tableau and QuickSight
Working knowledge of NetSuite
About Aurea Software

Aurea was founded with the singular vision of helping businesses succeed in today’s complex digital landscape. To achieve that goal, we do things differently. Our customers enjoy access to every product in our portfolio - all of which are cloud-based, enterprise-scale, and easy to use - with one simple subscription. We focus on relationships instead of transactions. And our unique AureaOne operating model and acquisition strategy ensure that our portfolio continues to grow, so we can continue to provide competitive advantage and differentiated results for our customers no matter what the future holds.

Aurea was an early adopter of remote work. In fact, our entire team of nearly 2,000 people and growing operates in a fully-remote work model.

There is so much to cover for this exciting role, and space here is limited. Hit the Apply button if you found this interesting and want to learn more. We look forward to meeting you!

Working with Crossover

This is a full-time (40 hours per week), long-term position. The position is immediately available and requires entering into an independent contractor agreement with Crossover. The compensation level for this role is $30 USD/hour, which equates to $60,000 USD/year assuming 40 hours per week and 50 weeks per year. The payment period is weekly. Consult www.crossover.com/help-and-faqs for more details on this topic.

What to expect next:
You will receive an email with a link to start your self-paced, online job application.
Our hiring platform will guide you through a series of online “screening” assessments to check for basic job fit, job-related skills, and finally a few real-world job-specific assignments.
Important! If you do not receive an email from us:
First, emails may take up to 15 minutes to send, refresh and check again.
Second, check your spam and junk folders for an email from Crossover.com, mark as “Not Spam” since you will receive other emails as well.
Third, we will send to whatever email account you indicated on the Apply form - by default, that is the email address you use as your LinkedIn username and it might be different than the one you have already checked.
If all else fails, just reset your password by visiting https://www.crossover.com/auth/reset-password if you already applied using LinkedIn EasyApply.
Crossover Job Code: LJ-4784-ID-Surabaya-SeniorFinancia.001

title: Marketing Planner
description:
Jet Commerce is the one-stop-solution for your e-commerce business development. We act not only as brands' sales drive engine, but also as their marketing propaganda frontier. Our services includes Store Operation, Digital Marketing, Creative Design, Photo and Video, Customer Relation Management, Omnichannel system and Fulﬁllment.

We have now based in few of the fastest growing e-commerce countries being Indonesia, Vietnam, Thailand, Philippines, China and Malaysia.

Job Description

Managing online brand and product campaigns to raise brand awareness.
Develop and implement digital media and advertising in both online and offline platform.
Explore and maximize social media channels to raise brand awareness.
Develop strategies to drive online traffic to the company.
Responsible in planning budgetary control of all digital marketing.
Assist to develop and implement marketing strategies for brand awareness and customer generation across ecommerce platform
Execute and support integrated marketing campaigns across the region for solutions
Identify fresh and interesting topics for digital content.
Work with creative teams to generate the visual content of the webpage
Provide campaign analysis and reporting to understand the ROI of these programs and campaigns for optimization and continuous improvement in all marketing plan
Daily monitoring of competitor visibility, pricing and other promotion strategy (on-site and off-site)
Collect and recap all data regarding competitor visibility, pricing and other promotion strategy
Analyze data and find the key to improve sales performance with attention to detail and accuracy
Discuss findings with marketing team to create attractive promotion


Job Qualification

Candidate must process at least a Bachelor's degree in any major.
Max. 30 years old.
Required language(s): Fluent in English, Mandarin will be plus.
At Least 1 year experiences in digital marketing, information system, project management, business analyst, finance, audit, ecommerce.
Proven working experience as a data analyst or business data analyst.
Familiar with E-marketing and online media.
Experienced in large brand campaign participation.
Advanced excel skills
Knowledge of online media marketing, paid search, display advertising, google adword and other digital marketing channels

title: Assistant Manager, Growth Marketing
description:
Job Description:

Life at Grab

At Grab, every Grabber is guided by The Grab Way, which spells out our mission, how we believe we can achieve it, and our operating principles - the 4Hs: Heart, Hunger, Honor and Humility. These principles guide and help us make decisions as we work to create economic empowerment for the people of Southeast Asia.

Get to know the team

The GrabFood Marketing team is a young, established, long standing team responsible for nurturing love and relation with our eaters and merchants. We make an impact by expanding the marketplace thus helping the ecosystem to benefit from it. Our team is made up of people with a growth mindset, data-driven, open mind and can do attitude yet still having fun . If you are looking for an opportunity to grow yet contributing to solving user problems and the success of those small & medium businesses , then you should join our team!

Get to know the role

We are looking for a Growth Marketing Assistant Manager for GrabFood. If you believe you have what it takes then we’d love to hear from you. This role is required because we want to ensure our marketplace keeps growing in usership. In return, you will get an opportunity to grow yourself and contribute to the success of small businesses.

The Day-to-Day Activities
Report to Growth Marketing Manager
Driving New User initiatives plan, both online and offline
Develop GTM plan of various new feature and its adoption (ie Referral, Ratings, SO etc)
Monitor Data for various source to optimize Mkt campaign (data analyst)
Doing Experiment of marketing ops (A/B testing)
Drive current Offline to Online user acquisition feature such as Takeaway, Dine In
You collaborate with partnership team to grow the usership
You will collaborate with various functional teams, including Product ops and Campaign team to develop communication that resonate to our customers.
You are responsible for New User growth, Monthly transacting user and feature adoption
The Must-Haves
You have Heart, Hunger, Honor and Humility
You have Marketing related experience with minimum 3 years
Strong knowledge and experience in Digital marketing, channel marketing, social media, email marketing, owned media and PR
Strong project management, organized and attention to detail
Proficiency in using Google sheet, Slide, Doc
Preferable from F&B/Tech/ECommerce/FMCG industry
Our Commitment:

We recognize that with these individual attributes come different workplace challenges, and we will work with Grabbers to address them in our journey towards creating inclusion at Grab for all Grabbers.

About Grab

Grab is the leading superapp platform in Southeast Asia, providing everyday services that matter to consumers. Today, the Grab app has been downloaded onto millions of mobile devices, giving users access to over 9 million drivers, merchants, and agents. Grab offers a wide range of on-demand services in the region, including mobility, food, package and grocery delivery services, mobile payments, and financial services across 428 cities in eight countries

Join us today to drive Southeast Asia forward, together.

title: Senior Manager, Marketing Strategy (Bangkok Based, Relocation Provided)
description:
About Agoda

Agoda is an online travel booking platform for accommodations, flights, and more. We build and deploy cutting-edge technology that connects travelers with more than 2.5 million accommodations globally. Based in Asia and part of Booking Holdings, our 4,000+ employees representing 90+ nationalities foster a work environment rich in diversity, creativity, and collaboration. We innovate through a culture of experimentation and ownership, enhancing the ability for our customers to experience the world.

Get to Know our Team:

The Performance Marketing Team of Agoda is a world leader in online marketing. This department is highly data-driven and focused on developing at-scale marketing programs that improve the lifetime value of Agoda customers through measurable marketing programs and channels. The team is a blend of the best analysts, marketing strategists, and data scientists in the world. The marketing leadership at Agoda have deep experience in data science, product, strategy, and other marketing fields and have built an organization that thrives on data, creative ideas, and technology.

The Opportunity:

We’re looking for Senior Manager, Marketing Strategy to scale and drive growth across business vertical. You will work directly with multiple stakeholders, including executive leadership, product leadership and data analyst teams.

In this role, you will impact Agoda’s business through exploring new opportunities, identifying experiments, analyzing complex scaling challenges, and formulating structure and framework to existing operations. We’re looking for the future leaders who think critically, test, learn from mistakes, and adapt quickly.

This position offers high visibility with senior management and with other departments within the company. This position is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

In this Role, You’ll Get to:

Drive business-level vision by providing strategic context to product roadmaps
Implement competitive analysis and develop actionable insights on our markets and business trends, and disseminate this knowledge across Agoda to make key decisions
Set up operational processes and help our leaders run the business skillfully, which includes clarifying accountability, putting structure and framework, as well as seeing through business-critical success metrics

What You’ll Need to Succeed:

Bachelor’s degree in a quantitative/numerical field; MBA or other advanced technical degree preferred
5+ years’ experience in top-tier management consulting, investment banking, private equity, or strategy/business operations for a fast-growing globally operating tech company
Strong analytical abilities, especially with respect to experimental design and analysis
Strategic thinking and planning, hands-on mentality
Excellent skills in presenting and analyzing data and creating actionable reports
Experience in and a passion for projects involving big data and statistical models
Excellent interpersonal skills and demonstrated ability to report and persuade different levels, including senior management

title: Business Analyst
description:
The ideal candidate is a team player who will be responsible for working with company data in various business areas. Specific responsibilities include reporting metrics, analyzing methodologies, suggesting operation improvements, and building proposal evaluations in a cross-functional environment.
Responsibilities
Conduct data analysis to identify trends and extract insights that will drive decisions and strategies for future business performance.
Develop and monitor data quality metrics to ensure that business data and reporting needs are addressed accordingly.
Create detailed business analysis by outlining problems, opportunities and solutions.
Define key business requirements to be reported to appropriate stakeholders.
Maintain a competitive market knowledge.
Understanding strategic business needs and plans for growth.
Conduct market analysis
Analyzing both product lines and overall profitability of the business
Use data (financial, operation, etc) to analyze your findings and create suggestions for business and operational improvements

Qualifications
Have a minimum Bachelor’s Degree in Finance & Accounting or related fields (Business Management, Economic, etc)
At least 2 years of experience in analytical roles or similar.
Good communication skills, both oral and written in English and Bahasa Indonesia.
Interpersonal and consultative skills.
Excellent analytical thinking, problem-solving, and organizational skills.
Detail-oriented and capable of delivering data with a high level of accuracy.
Possessing knowledge of processes modeling, networks, databases, business structure, sales, and marketing strategy, cost and benefit analysis, and other relevant technology is a big plus.
Have a proactive and inquisitive nature.
Possess good presentation skills with an ability to explain complex analyses in an understandable manner for a wide target audience.

title: Business Intelligence - Financial Services
description:
About The Role

In GoTo, we put a really high value on data. To get insight, and knowledge and eventually make a decision. That’s why one of our company values is “Become a Scientist”. As a BI Analyst, you will have tons of data to play with. From voices of customers and transactional information, just to name a few. You will be dealing with dashboards, and reports and even take part in experimentation to determine the best strategy. You will have close interactions with multiple stakeholders within the Insurance team and other teams in GoTo Financials Services.

What You Will Do

Become a master of all Insurance related data points
Manage all Operations dashboards and reports, to ensure that it is available timely and accurately
Provide analytical insights to support all stakeholders
Support the Insurance team in executing any experimentation
Analyze, Evaluate and Initiate improvement in our day-to-day operation to ensure efficiency, effectiveness, and scalability

What You Will Need

Minimum a Bachelor's Degree in Engineering, Mathematics, Statistics, or related discipline
At least 3 years of experience in a fast-paced environment with experience in project management and data analytics
Strong analytical, planning, and problem-solving skills
Fluency in SQL, Advanced Excel and highly proficient in working with numbers and data sets (Knowing Python and automating job is a big plus)
Ability to work independently with good time management skills in collaboration with cross-functional groups to drive initiatives that aim at achieving OKR
Ability to adapt from a big-picture thinker to one who is also detail-oriented and can navigate through different situations/topics
About The Team

GoTo Financial Services consists of a multitude of cool, multi-talented, and diverse personalities. You will become a cog in a machine that is determined to provide the best financial services product to our customers. Your contribution will be meaningful. You will be exposed to a fast-paced, open, and inclusive working environment. You will meet experts in service, collection, risk, product, and marketing, and their skills and knowledge will enhance yours. But hey, it will not be all work and no play. We also know how to have fun. We have lots of engagement events (movie nights, informal talk sessions, home workouts) that you can participate in.

About GoTo Financial

GoTo Financial brings secure, reliable, and user-friendly financial solutions to over 55 million monthly active users, more than 14 million merchants, and over 2.5 million driver-partners eager to benefit from the digital economy in the GoTo ecosystem.

GoTo Financial’s consumer services include GoPay, GoPayLater, and other financial services. We also serve businesses of all sizes through leading payment gateway Midtrans, Indonesia’s largest cloud POS network Moka and GoKasir. We also have the all-in-one merchant solution GoBiz, GoBiz Plus, GoStore, and Selly - available in Indonesia and Southeast Asia.

GoTo Financial is committed to building a diverse and inclusive workplace and are equal opportunity employers. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, national origin, gender, gender identity, sexual orientation, disability, age, education status, or any other legally protected status.

title: Business Analyst
description:
We are looking for
We are looking for a Business analyst to join our growing team of business intelligence experts to identify opportunities and make recommendations that will improve and optimize current business processes and reach company goals.
The ideal candidate has a knack of breaking down business processes and analyzing relevant data sets to optimize the business and convert insights into strategic opportunities for our company.
The BI Analyst will work closely with stakeholders across product, operations, and marketing to support and implement high-quality data driven analysis.

Responsibilities:
• Discovering insights about our business, processes, and market behaviors. • Ensure accuracy, adequacy and legitimacy of data in analysis.
• Analyse, interpret and present results through effective visualisation, reports, and presentations.
• Identify new opportunities and make recommendations to improve and optimize current business processes and reach company goals.
• Liaise with business stakeholders to understand the requirements for analysis and improvement.

Required skills:
• Excellent written and oral communication skills for both technical and business audience.
• Bachelor's degree in any field which requires logically creative thinking. • Proficient in Excel.
• Experience in SQL.
• 3 years of experience in an analyst role at a technology/financial company. • Strong analytical mindset and problem-solving skills.
• Ability to independently drive analysis concluding with rationalized recommendations
• High ownership of business problems in the company and ensure they are truly solved.
• Intense curiosity and drive to solve business problems and deliver impact

title: BI analyst
description:
Own and maintain on the source of truth for financial reporting across business lines, by working closely with stakeholders from Finance (FP&A, accounting, AP/AR) and business team (Sales and Operations)
Develop and maintain data warehouse models (analytics tables) using dbt, by developing data pipelines (ELT) through dbt
Design and develop analytics dashboards in Data Studio and Metabase to track key metrics to be consumed by leaders and ops at Kargo
Become a technical expert to guide, mentor, and develop data users (data champions) within the organization

Requirements
Bachelors degree in reputable university
Proficient in data tools such as SQL, Metabase, Google Data Studio, Python, R, Google sheets
Ability to breakdown a gereral problem into a data problem (data modelling skills), such as understanding how ERD works
Understanding of accounting/tax is a huge plus

title: Business Intelligence Analyst
description:
Boost Indonesia is a financial services platform brand by AXIATA DIGITAL, the digital services arm of AXIATA GROUP, that serves and empowers micro-enterprises and SMEs - to transform life for the unbanked and underserved.

We are now operating in INDONESIA and seeking for a BI Analyst to join our Boost Indonesia family.

SCOPE & RESPONSIBILITY:
Build credit risk analytics and reporting for lending customer
Monitoring portfolio performance and analytics on monthly and/or ad-hoc basis
Conduct data-driven analysis and provide user/product insight
Work with stakeholders across different business function for reports, dashboards, and other analysis

QUALIFICATIONS:
Min. 5 years of experience in risk analytics / data analysis / business intelligence analyst role
Understand the key credit risk and market risk assessment metrics
Familiar with the following lending products and understand the key risk factors associated with it: Micro & SME lending, portfolio performance by bucket delinquency, Month On Book (MOB) Analysis, Waterfall & Funnel Analysis, Collection metrics i.e %30+, %90+, flow rate, write-off.
Possess strong analytical and problem-solving skills
Having experience in banking, multi-finance and fintech is preferred
Solid technical skills in :
Building datamart / datawarehoue
Create Management Dashboard (Tableau, Metabase, Google Looker, Etc)
Understand the concept of data transformation (SSIS, ETL, DTS, ect)
SQL, Big Query , MySQL etc.

title: Senior BI Analyst
description:
Work related to data story telling and empowerment:
You can structure your and drive your own data projects with medium-complexity that contributes towards your analytics scope, driving the product/business direction with data
You influence the product direction by convincing through clear hypothesis framework and analysis
You proactively agree on timeframes with business leads or PMs. You meet deadlines and communicate delays and blockers.
You can help improve the team’s data analysis and interpretation skills

Work related to your technical craft:
You can build well-structured, traceable and updatable analysis.
You design user friendly dashboards that bring insight without being overwhelming
You use advanced SQL e.g. Window functions and UDFs.
If the team needs it, you can perform basic tasks in Python, R or on similar programs.
You apply basic statistics concepts – percentiles, types of averages, significance, regressions, and bring meaning to data

Requirements
Bachelor Degree from reputable university
Has at least 4 years experience in data
Able to give guidance for the juniors
Experience in working with some of the following tools; Airflow, Airbyte, Kafka, BigQuery, Google Data Studio, Metabase, Python, R is a plus

title: Associate Data Warehouse Developer
description:
We think you also hate when travel app is giving you a headache, right? A slight misinformation can ruin the trip.

That is exactly what we are tackling as t-fam! Making sure that our 17+ million users have the best experience in crafting their own adventure.

Data warehouse developers are responsible for handling the delivery of data and information relating to the business intelligence of the organization for which they work. They design, develop, manage, and optimize Data Warehouse with flexible and scalable data and ETL architecture to provide enterprise data services for stakeholders and applications for reporting, analytics, and research.

Data warehouse developers are responsible for the successful delivery of business intelligence information to the entire organization. They design data models, and define both logical and physical models. They also develop and prepare schedules for a new data warehouse and not to overlook playing active roles in ensuring data governance policies are implemented and adhered to. As a data warehouse developer, sound analytical and communication skills are required.

Job Descriptions
Design, propose, and implement a Data Warehouse solution with the support and assistance of Data Engineer for both real-time and batch data flows
Align with BI Analyst, Engineer, Commercial, and Product team to analyze the data from various sources and design the structure as per business requirements
Assist in several aspects of data warehouse, including ELT/ETL, data quality evaluation and management, data modeling, database architecture, warehousing principles, and other activities
Provide day-to-day support for data warehouse troubleshooting process, procedures, optimization, and data anomalies; not only to correct the data but also to identify the source of the corruption
Assists various departments to manage all activities related to EDW utilization
Create and manage architecture documentation and project artifacts such as data models, data dictionaries, etc
Assist other data warehouse team members in the enforcement of appropriate maintenance and development of all data according to the established standards
Monitor reliability and availability of all data and adopt tools when necessary
Requirements
Bachelor from notable university with computer science, statistics, mathematics, or engineering background
1 year of relevant Business Intelligence/Analytics/Data Warehousing/Data Integration work experience
1 year data modeling (logical/physical, relational and document/object)
Strong understanding of Dimensional Modeling and other modeling techniques
Strong written and verbal communication skills
Strong problem-solving and analytical skills
Strong understanding of SDLC best practices with an emphasis on DW/BI/Analytics practices
Preferably knowledgeable in various Database: RDBMS (MySQL, PostgreSQL, or SQL Server), and NoSQL (MongoDB, DynamoDB, or Cassandra)
Exposed/ Experienced with some / several cloud-based data warehouse systems such as Google Big Query, Ms. Azure, Teradata, Snowflake, etc

In the event that you haven’t received any updates after 3 weeks, your data will be kept and we may contact you for another career destination. Meanwhile, discover more about tiket.com on Instagram, LinkedIn, or YouTube.

title: Business Intelligence - Financial Services
description:
Business Intelligence - Financial Services .

About The Role

In GoTo, we put a really high value on data. To get insight, and knowledge and eventually make a decision. That’s why one of our company values is “Become a Scientist”. As a BI Analyst, you will have tons of data to play with. From voices of customers and transactional information, just to name a few. You will be dealing with dashboards, and reports and even take part in experimentation to determine the best strategy. You will have close interactions with multiple stakeholders within the Insurance team and other teams in GoTo Financials Services.

Business Intelligence - Financial Services .

About The Role

In GoTo, we put a really high value on data. To get insight, and knowledge and eventually make a decision. That’s why one of our company values is “Become a Scientist”. As a BI Analyst, you will have tons of data to play with. From voices of customers and transactional information, just to name a few. You will be dealing with dashboards, and reports and even take part in experimentation to determine the best strategy. You will have close interactions with multiple stakeholders within the Insurance team and other teams in GoTo Financials Services.

What You Will Do
Become a master of all Insurance related data points
Manage all Operations dashboards and reports, to ensure that it is available timely and accurately
Provide analytical insights to support all stakeholders
Support the Insurance team in executing any experimentation
Analyze, Evaluate and Initiate improvement in our day-to-day operation to ensure efficiency, effectiveness, and scalability

What You Will Need
Minimum a Bachelor's Degree in Engineering, Mathematics, Statistics, or related discipline
At least 3 years of experience in a fast-paced environment with experience in project management and data analytics
Strong analytical, planning, and problem-solving skills
Fluency in SQL, Advanced Excel and highly proficient in working with numbers and data sets (Knowing Python and automating job is a big plus)
Ability to work independently with good time management skills in collaboration with cross-functional groups to drive initiatives that aim at achieving OKR
Ability to adapt from a big-picture thinker to one who is also detail-oriented and can navigate through different situations/topics

About The Team

GoTo Financial Services consists of a multitude of cool, multi-talented, and diverse personalities. You will become a cog in a machine that is determined to provide the best financial services product to our customers. Your contribution will be meaningful. You will be exposed to a fast-paced, open, and inclusive working environment. You will meet experts in service, collection, risk, product, and marketing, and their skills and knowledge will enhance yours. But hey, it will not be all work and no play. We also know how to have fun. We have lots of engagement events (movie nights, informal talk sessions, home workouts) that you can participate in.

About GoTo Financial

GoTo Financial brings secure, reliable, and user-friendly financial solutions to over 55 million monthly active users, more than 14 million merchants, and over 2.5 million driver-partners eager to benefit from the digital economy in the GoTo ecosystem.

GoTo Financial’s consumer services include GoPay, GoPayLater, and other financial services. We also serve businesses of all sizes through leading payment gateway Midtrans, Indonesia’s largest cloud POS network Moka and GoKasir. We also have the all-in-one merchant solution GoBiz, GoBiz Plus, GoStore, and Selly - available in Indonesia and Southeast Asia.

GoTo Financial is committed to building a diverse and inclusive workplace and are equal opportunity employers. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, national origin, gender, gender identity, sexual orientation, disability, age, education status, or any other legally protected status.

title: Business Analyst
description:

Identifies gaps and provides technical expertise in business requirements for system functional specifications and scales new and current systems, processes and procedures in a cost effective manner.

title: Business Analyst
description:
Are you a compelling storyteller with a passion for the Agri-tech startup space? Do you want to create a lasting impact by transforming and innovating our Indonesian farmers’ lives?

Who We Are?
We are an Agri-tech startup with a unique vision to modernize the end-to-end poultry supply chain in Indonesia.
Pitik was built from the ground up by 2 serial entrepreneurs who were passionate about creating sustainable solutions that improve the livelihood of our farmers within the Agri-space. With trust at the foundation of our business model, we aim to support Indonesian farmers by developing technological innovations that help streamline their operations and increase their productivity.

Our Mission
Our mission is to be THE best partner for Indonesian chicken farmers. Through our smart technology, we aim to empower local farmers by equipping them with our smart IoT devices and AI-powered algorithms to optimize every aspect of the process - from the point of poultry production to its point of sale.

Your impact (Job Description)
As the Business Analyst, here’s how you will have a significant impact at Pitik.
• Understand business growth needs, translate data into insights, and create strategic planning to grow and improve the business and operations.
• Analyze variances from the project plan, compile alternatives, and execute the preferred recommendations in the area of business growth, operations, area expansion, etc.
• Create a business plan, conduct quantitative and qualitative benchmarking, perform contract pricing analysis to support business growth, including troubleshooting potential problems, identifying root causes, and proposing solutions and improvements.

If you Are (Requirements)
• 1 to 3 years of working experience in Business Consulting / Business Analyst from a tech startup.
• Able to work with ambiguity, independently, always ready to pivot.
• A Self-starter, able to follow up and work with key stakeholders to create the business outcome.
• Strong in quantitative & qualitative analysis, well knowledge and experience with data analysis tools.

title: Business Analyst- Beds Network (Bangkok Based, relocation provided)
description:
About Agoda

Agoda is an online travel booking platform for accommodations, flights, and more. We build and deploy cutting-edge technology that connects travelers with more than 2.5 million accommodations globally. Based in Asia and part of Booking Holdings, our 4,000+ employees representing 90+ nationalities foster a work environment rich in diversity, creativity, and collaboration. We innovate through a culture of experimentation and ownership, enhancing the ability for our customers to experience the world.

Get to Know our Team:

The Agoda Beds Network team is a new department within Agoda, focusing on improving Agoda’s wholesale supply quality and inventory. As our accommodation partners are a key to our success, we work hard to ensure their success. The Agoda Beds Network team specializes in strategic account management, and data is at the core of everything we do. We serve as consultants and thought leaders to our partners, offering strategic advice on how best to excel on Agoda’s commercial platforms through innovative solutions. With the help of industry-leading technology, we work and collaborate globally to bring together the best ideas from diverse perspectives and strive in ensuring the best value for our partners, our customers, and Agoda overall.

The Opportunity:

As Business Analyst, your main objective will be to lead the analysis and data visibility required to identify opportunities for optimization for our hotel partners to grow on the Agoda platform. Your role is also to use data to provide transparency and efficiency to the Business Development teams on the ground and guide them in growing the business. You will be instrumental in ensuring there is consistency in data being used for reporting, identifying value-added data to help the business grow as well as using data to make strategic business decisions. You will be expected to dig into data to provide business insights, guide decision-making and offer valuable inputs to further grow our business model.

In this Role, you’ll get to:

Analyze and develop reports and models we can use for performance tracking and optimization, drawing recommendations from your analysis
Build, enhance and streamline reports that help team members and internal stakeholders understand the performance of their business and identify action points
Perform ad-hoc analysis on business trends and results independently, translate and communicate results to leadership and key stakeholders
Provide input on ongoing projects and initiatives to reach business targets; run and assess your proposed actions in collaboration with the relevant teams
Make recommendations for new metrics, techniques, and strategies to improve team performance and measurement in the future
Hone your analytical skills in better understanding business and conversion drivers and how to optimize them
Prepare and present high quality weekly reports and business insights to leadership
Work in a data-driven environment
Use out-of-the-box thinking to develop and implement solutions to unique challenges
Work cross-functionally in a dynamic, fast-paced and challenging environment

What you’ll Need to Succeed:

Bachelor’s degree or higher in Mathematics, Business, Economics, Data Science, Information Technology or similar field
Bachelor’s Degree or higher in computer sciences, engineering, mathematics, statistics, data science or a related degree program. Masters degree preferred
Advanced domain of data analysis and data visualization tools and software such as Excel, SQL, Tableau, Python or similar
Analytical mindset, with proven track record in using data to measure performance and make decisions
Excellent problem-solving skills including the ability to analyze and resolve complex problems using data
Ability to work under pressure in a fast-paced and rapidly changing environment
Excellent communication skills (both verbal and written), with proven ability to convey complex messages clearly and with conviction
Team player with strong interpersonal, relationship-building, and stakeholder management skills

title: Business Analyst
description:
Business Analyst .

About The Role

This role will provide you a unique opportunity to build & shape the strategy at the largest payment gateway in Indonesia - Midtrans. You’ll have a unique opportunity to transform the landscape of a merchant payment company and take part in the success story of GoTo Financial in conquering the payment ecology in Indonesia. As the main Business Analyst, you will assist everyone in the tribe in driving data-driven strategies and playing an important role in the new data-driven operating model, where you will focus on the relentless execution of experiments to drive optimization and instrument data for fast feedback loop. You will also assist the Head of Strategy in business case analysis, strategizing and prioritizing projects in driving business growth and delivering merchant-centric experience through analyzing merchant’s behavior and listening to the voice of merchants.

Business Analyst .

About The Role

This role will provide you a unique opportunity to build & shape the strategy at the largest payment gateway in Indonesia - Midtrans. You’ll have a unique opportunity to transform the landscape of a merchant payment company and take part in the success story of GoTo Financial in conquering the payment ecology in Indonesia. As the main Business Analyst, you will assist everyone in the tribe in driving data-driven strategies and playing an important role in the new data-driven operating model, where you will focus on the relentless execution of experiments to drive optimization and instrument data for fast feedback loop. You will also assist the Head of Strategy in business case analysis, strategizing and prioritizing projects in driving business growth and delivering merchant-centric experience through analyzing merchant’s behavior and listening to the voice of merchants.

What You Will Do
Support the Card Present/Offline team in developing the product, ops, and sales strategy for Midtrans
Conduct research and analyses of operational effectiveness and processes for stakeholders
Assist Head of Function in developing reports to present company’s strategies and performance in monthly cadences with senior leadership
Discover business problems and growth opportunities in the business and merchant metrics by exploring business data, transaction data, merchant activity and needs, and actual merchant insights
Validate solutions and other related hypotheses through robust experimentation and taking a statistical approach
Track metrics performance, work with the analytics team
Develop business cases and provide ad-hoc support/analysis on critical projects/initiatives

What You Will Need
Bachelor's degree in a related discipline from a reputable university
Minimum of 6 years experience in a strategic data analytics role (experience in management consulting / corporate strategy can be a strong plus)
Ability to work in a fast-paced, deadline-driven, and challenging work environment
Strong analytical and quantitative skills; ability to use hard data and metrics to back up assumptions, recommendations, and drive actions
Prior experience/proven ability to influence and collaborate with cross-functional teams
High level of proficiency using Excel, PowerPoint
Proficiency in PowerBI and SQL is a strong plus

About The Team

Our Payments team oversees GoPay (Southeast Asia’s fastest-growing consumer payments and financial services app), as well as Midtrans (one of Indonesia’s largest payment gateways), and Spots (Indonesia’s largest offline network for payments).

Our Merchant Payments team is part of the larger Payments platform and consists of passionate engineers based in Jakarta, Singapore, and Gurgaon. We run Southeast Asia’s leading financial platform for online and onsite merchants. It's our job to oversee all things related to empowering business owners and creating a seamless and efficient payment gateway solution. We also take the time to understand our merchant-partners daily concerns and experiences in order to cater our services to resolve any hurdles and expand their operations. The big question that we’re always trying to solve is: How can we better improve our digital experience for our merchants-partners.

We've helped simplify payments for over 300,000 merchant-partners in our respective regions - from retail stores in town to your favorite Gorengan and Martabak stalls. But, the growth of Payments does not stop here. We are hungry for more. We intend to become the largest payment and financial services group in Southeast Asia. We are working on several projects now, including one about enhancing direct interaction with our merchant-partners of a variety of businesses and their customers.

We’re a high-performing, tight-knit team who are committed to the growth of the company, as well as each other’s personal growth and well-being. Pre-COVID, factions of our team would enjoy catching up over a round of drinks after work. However, with WFH becoming more normalized, we've been sharing our favorite ways to prioritize a healthy work-life balance at home. Off-hours, you’d probably find us binging The Queen’s Gambit on Netflix, whipping up a loaf of sourdough bread, or trying our best to survive a HIIT workout on YouTube.

About Gojek

Gojek is a Super App. It is one app for ordering food, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, and a dozen other products. We are Indonesia’s first decacorn. We are also the only Southeast Asian startup to be part of Fortune's list of 'Companies That Changed The World.'

Our Mission: To create and scale positive socio-economic impact for our customers, driver-partners, business, and MSMEs.

As of 2018, Gojek processed more than $9 billion in annualized gross transaction value across all markets where it operates - in Singapore, Vietnam, and Indonesia. We have the largest food delivery product in Asia (outside of China) and is the largest payments wallet in Southeast Asia.

Gojek contributed IDR 249 T to the Indonesian economy (equivalent to 2% of Indonesia's GDP in 2020). As of Q1 2021, the Gojek App witnessed over 190mn downloads by customers. The platform has over 2mn Driver Partners & ~900000 Merchant Partners across SEA.

About GoTo Financial

GoTo Financial brings secure, reliable, and user-friendly financial solutions to over 55 million monthly active users, more than 14 million merchants, and over 2.5 million driver-partners eager to benefit from the digital economy in the GoTo ecosystem.

GoTo Financial’s consumer services include GoPay, GoPayLater, and other financial services. We also serve businesses of all sizes through leading payment gateway Midtrans, Indonesia’s largest cloud POS network Moka and GoKasir. We also have the all-in-one merchant solution GoBiz, GoBiz Plus, GoStore, and Selly - available in Indonesia and Southeast Asia.

Gojek and GoTo Financial are committed to building a diverse and inclusive workplace and are equal opportunity employers. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, national origin, gender, gender identity, sexual orientation, disability, age, education status, or any other legally protected status.

title: Business Analyst
description:
The Financial / Business Analyst supports management, especially the Controller / Financial Director and/or the General Manager / Chief Operating Officer (COO), in decision making regarding Finance & Control and Business matters, with investigations, analyses, reports, presentations and advice.

He/she performs economic research and analysis for use in the development of business strategies and tactics and in the subsequent appraisal of the results. The Financial / Business Analyst may also prepare statistical studies and (economic and financial) forecasts for business conditions and trends and draws relevant conclusions.

In a more generalist role as (Business) Analyst, he / she conducts analysis to identify trends and insights and to develop reports, campaigns and models concerning

business issues. The Analyst advises and challenges the business based on this information. He / she use business information market knowledge to develop tools and models required for insights and to enable decision-making.

In a junior position, a Financial / Business Analyst may support a more Senior Financial / Business Analyst at Divisional or Corporate level.

The Financial / Business Analyst supports decision making from a financial perspective analysing in a wide variety of business processes from various perspectives, such as costs, revenues, profitability etc. and assists in preparing proposals regarding CAPEX projects and (at divisional or corporate level) M&A projects.

At divisional / corporate levels, the Financial / Business Analyst will have contact with the Business Managers and discuss f.i. purchasing criteria, accountabilities of the different parties, etc. which might imply that the Business takes another course in an M&A process. He may have a strong influence on a value of several hundred million euros.

The Financial / Business Analyst will deliver an analyses of different scenarios of how to reach forecasted goals, he/she tunes in to the business and functional disciplines to obtain ideas, data and insights in order to support the strategy of the organisation.

Job Description:
Data collection and insight generation
Uses data and analysis in problem identification (bottlenecks, efficiencies, insights, etc.) continuously searching for data sources to conduct analysis valuable

to Nutreco, continuously enhancing the problem analysis / identification in terms of relevance, quality and insights, based on business requirements
Collects, analyses, coordinates and selects internal and external data and researches for further analysis, in order to have an optimal set of data and

research results available, which provides the relevant business area with desired information and/or further analyses or reporting.
Discovers ways in which business value can be drawn from analysis and develops trusted information with true insights. Visualizes the analysis and

transforms the analysis into valuable and relevant insights for business.
Advice
Advises colleagues and management (pro-actively and on request) on data and insight analysis, opportunities and market developments, in order to optimally

inform and advise internal stakeholders and customers about analysis and related insights.
Planning & Control cycle
Supports the business with the planning & control cycle, including the preparation of the 3 year development plan and annual budgets, and the reporting of

actual results:
Communicating guidelines and instructions, and creating templates to facilitate the planning and reporting processes
Participate in the financial review process between the OpCo(s), Division and Nutreco Corporate
Performing financial analysis of actual performance compared to plan and last year
Preparing management information, such as monthly reports and presentations on various topics
Assisting in the preparation and analysis of annual and half year figures
Market Developments / Investments
Assesses market developments using analytics and data insights, so that knowledge and insight of developments in area of expertise is up-to-date and

ensured in the long term
On request of the business, performs analysis of capital expenditures, credit applications, divestment proposals and other events with a major financial

impact, by:
Performing investigations and analyses in line with corporate guidelines
Preparing cover notes and presentations
Analysis / Analytics
Conducts and merges complex internal and external analysis. Carries out structural and ad hoc analysis and advanced analytics in order to transform data

and research into useful information, which offer useful insights and recommendations to the designated business area.
Develops and provides ad hoc financials analysis that add value to the business and contribute to the delivery of the Divisional strategy.
Provides assistance to functional counterparts in the OpCo / Division as required on matter involving cost determination issues, valuation, distribution of

overhead, treatment of costs and product pricing
May conduct special studies and analysis such as cost impact of proposed changes in facilities, systems and processes
Compliance
Supports and promotes the Division wide compliance to corporate policies, especially relating to the Finance and Administration functions.
Professional Development
Contributes to further professionalising the (Finance) function, including signalling of areas of improvement and implementing solutions.

Our organisation:

Nutreco is a global leader in animal nutrition and fish feed. Our advanced nutritional solutions are at the origin of food for millions of consumers worldwide. Quality, innovation and sustainability are guiding principles, embedded in the Nutreco culture from research and raw material procurement to products and services for agriculture and aquaculture. Experience across 100 years brings Nutreco a rich heritage of knowledge and experience for building its future.

Equal Opportunity Employer:

Nutreco is an equal opportunity employer; applicants are considered for all roles without regard to race, color, religious creed, sex, national origin, citizenship status, age, physical or mental disability, sexual orientation, marital, parental, military status or any other status protected by applicable local law. Please advise us at any point during the recruitment and selection process if you require accommodation. Nutreco is committed to compliance with all applicable legislation, including providing accommodation for applicants with disabilities.

title: Finance Business Analyst
description:
MAIN PURPOSE


To define business performance via in-depth analysis and gathering of technical and non-technical
information. Once each business performance by brands is clearly identified to outline detailed
requirements for improvement approach and to ensure real result for each business improvement shown.

KEY RESPONSIBILITIES

Perform financial planning, budgeting and forecasting, and actual operational analysis tracking
Analyze monthly financial report/performance, company investment is done in all aspects, and propose business improvement action for further management decision support
Work closely with the accounting team to ensure accurate financial reporting
Evaluate financial performance by comparing and analyzing actual results with plans, budgets, and forecasts
Provide analysis of trends, forecasts, and propose recommended actions for optimization
Identify and drive process improvements, including the creation of standard and ad-hoc reports, tools, and Excel dashboards
Close coordination and collaboration with Sales, Marketing, SCM, HR and Regulatory team in monitoring all costs being budgeted and deep dive in variance occurred in actuals. Work closely together with each to improve each Department’s performance.

REQUIREMENTS
Bachelor’s degree with min. of 3.5 years of working experience
Have a strong background in SAP Fiori, CEGID, Rpro.
Strong communication skills in English
High proficiency in financial modeling techniques
Strong fluency with Microsoft functions (Excel, PPT, Macro, etc)
Exceptional analytical and conceptual thinking skills
Ability to understand and analyze problems and be proactive in giving proposals for improvement
Excellent planning, forecasting, budgeting, organizational, and time management skills
Possess a positive working attitude, and the ability to work independently or with a team.
Good listener, communicator, and quick problem solver.

title: Business Analyst- Beds Network (Bangkok Based, relocation provided)
description:
About Agoda

Agoda is an online travel booking platform for accommodations, flights, and more. We build and deploy cutting-edge technology that connects travelers with more than 2.5 million accommodations globally. Based in Asia and part of Booking Holdings, our 4,000+ employees representing 90+ nationalities foster a work environment rich in diversity, creativity, and collaboration. We innovate through a culture of experimentation and ownership, enhancing the ability for our customers to experience the world.

Get to Know our Team:

The Agoda Beds Network team is a new department within Agoda, focusing on improving Agoda’s wholesale supply quality and inventory. As our accommodation partners are a key to our success, we work hard to ensure their success. The Agoda Beds Network team specializes in strategic account management, and data is at the core of everything we do. We serve as consultants and thought leaders to our partners, offering strategic advice on how best to excel on Agoda’s commercial platforms through innovative solutions. With the help of industry-leading technology, we work and collaborate globally to bring together the best ideas from diverse perspectives and strive in ensuring the best value for our partners, our customers, and Agoda overall.

The Opportunity:

As Business Analyst, your main objective will be to lead the analysis and data visibility required to identify opportunities for optimization for our hotel partners to grow on the Agoda platform. Your role is also to use data to provide transparency and efficiency to the Business Development teams on the ground and guide them in growing the business. You will be instrumental in ensuring there is consistency in data being used for reporting, identifying value-added data to help the business grow as well as using data to make strategic business decisions. You will be expected to dig into data to provide business insights, guide decision-making and offer valuable inputs to further grow our business model.

In this Role, you’ll get to:

Analyze and develop reports and models we can use for performance tracking and optimization, drawing recommendations from your analysis
Build, enhance and streamline reports that help team members and internal stakeholders understand the performance of their business and identify action points
Perform ad-hoc analysis on business trends and results independently, translate and communicate results to leadership and key stakeholders
Provide input on ongoing projects and initiatives to reach business targets; run and assess your proposed actions in collaboration with the relevant teams
Make recommendations for new metrics, techniques, and strategies to improve team performance and measurement in the future
Hone your analytical skills in better understanding business and conversion drivers and how to optimize them
Prepare and present high quality weekly reports and business insights to leadership
Work in a data-driven environment
Use out-of-the-box thinking to develop and implement solutions to unique challenges
Work cross-functionally in a dynamic, fast-paced and challenging environment

What you’ll Need to Succeed:

Bachelor’s degree or higher in Mathematics, Business, Economics, Data Science, Information Technology or similar field
Bachelor’s Degree or higher in computer sciences, engineering, mathematics, statistics, data science or a related degree program. Masters degree preferred
Advanced domain of data analysis and data visualization tools and software such as Excel, SQL, Tableau, Python or similar
Analytical mindset, with proven track record in using data to measure performance and make decisions
Excellent problem-solving skills including the ability to analyze and resolve complex problems using data
Ability to work under pressure in a fast-paced and rapidly changing environment
Excellent communication skills (both verbal and written), with proven ability to convey complex messages clearly and with conviction
Team player with strong interpersonal, relationship-building, and stakeholder management skills
