title: Manager, Data Analytics
description:
Job Description:

Life at Grab

At Grab, every Grabber is guided by The Grab Way, which spells out our mission, how we believe we can achieve it, and our operating principles - the 4Hs: Heart, Hunger, Honour and Humility. These principles guide and help us make decisions as we work to create economic empowerment for the people of Southeast Asia.

Get to know the Team

Our team supports our business stakeholders with analysis and recommendations related to digital goods pricing and agent network management. We work with big data to analyze performance, identify business opportunities, and extract insight from the data. The team will work closely with various cross-functional teams, including regional city managers, business development, product management, and business strategy.

Get to know the Role

You will be using your data and analytics skills to work through varied sources of data and extract insights related to agent network lifecycle management and digital goods / financial services pricing. You will need to translate your business stakeholder’s questions into queries and analysis. The day-to-day work involves hands-on analysis with big data spanning across many topics, and it would be a good opportunity to develop analytical skills. You will also provide guidance to a junior data scientist team member, on both strategic planning and technical guidance.

The Day-to-Day Activities
Using SQL and Python to deep dive into the data and answer complex business questions
Use visualization libraries like plotly, seaborn, matplotlib to visualize key insights from rich data
Build simulation tools combining python and google sheets to enable decision-makers test different business scenarios
Use statistical techniques & methodologies to design and analyze various experiments
Build dashboards using Tableau / Power BI / Python to monitor business performance & insights
Discuss with stakeholders about business problems, then translate it into specific analytical steps and solution
Write analytical reports in docs and slides to articulate the study findings and insights
Present analysis findings to business stakeholders; facilitate business discussion driven by data & analytics
The Must-Haves
Bachelor’s degree in Economics / Computer Science / MIS / Industrial Engineering / Mathematics / other quantitative disciplines with strong academics performance
Work experience between 4-8 years.
Participation in math / science / programming / business case study competitions is a plus
SQL, and Python/R skills will be advantageous, but not mandatory for strong candidates. Do share if you have a portfolio of projects
Intellectual curiosity and willingness to continuously learn
Structured problem solving and ability to connect the dots to derive insights
Good communication skills - the candidate is expected to write analysis reports and present them to business stakeholders
Empathy to our partners (drivers, merchants, agents, customers, and business stakeholders) to connect between the analytical and real-world reality
Our Commitment

We recognize that with these individual attributes come different workplace challenges, and we will work with Grabbers to address them in our journey towards creating inclusion at Grab for all Grabbers.

About Grab

Grab is the leading superapp platform in Southeast Asia, providing everyday services that matter to consumers. Today, the Grab app has been downloaded onto millions of mobile devices, giving users access to over 9 million drivers, merchants, and agents. Grab offers a wide range of on-demand services in the region, including mobility, food, package and grocery delivery services, mobile payments, and financial services across 428 cities in eight countries.

Join us today to drive Southeast Asia forward, together.

title: [EY한영] 감사본부 FAAS부문 Data Strategy Consulting팀 경력직 모집
description:
EY에서는 글로벌 규모, 지원, 포용성 있는 문화 및 기술과 함께 최고의 인재가 되어 특별한 커리어를 만들 수 있습니다.

당신만의 커리어와 관점으로 더 나은 EY를 만들고, 이를 통해 더 나은 업무 환경을 만들어 나가는 일에 동참해보십시오.

[EY 한영] 감사본부 FAAS부문 Data Strategy Consulting팀 경력직 모집

FAAS 부문 Data Strategy Consulting팀은 기업들이 보유하고 있는 다양한 형태의 데이터를 기반으로 기존 사업모델의 고도화 및 신규 사업모델의 수립에 이르기까지 데이터 밸류체인의 전 단계에서 기업가치를 제고하기 위한 전략을 고민합니다.

데이터의 수집/가공/분석 등 데이터 오퍼레이션 관점의 Data Scientist/Analyst의 역할보다는, 데이터의 활용가치를 극대화하기 위한 비즈니스 모델의 구축, M&A, JV 등 협업 생태계 구축 및 신규사업 등 사업전략의 수립에 초점을 맞춘 전략 컨설팅 서비스를 제공하고 있습니다. 이 과정에서, 다양한 순수 전략 컨설팅 서비스도 포괄적으로 함께 수행합니다

[ 모집 분야]

FAAS 부문 Data Strategy Consulting팀 수행 업무
기업 간 데이터 제휴를 통한 시너지 창출 전략 수립
데이터 기반 신규사업 전략 수립
빅데이터 플랫폼 비즈니스 전략 수립
데이터 상품화 전략 수립 등
[ 지원자격 및 우대사항]
컨설팅 펌(전략/오퍼레이션) 및 대기업 전략기획 부서 등 관련 업무 경험 3년 이상 (전략컨설팅 경력자의 경우, 당사 ( 파르테논) 및 업계 전략펌 보상수준 고려하여 대우)
증권사/투자사 애널리스트 및 심사역 경험자 우대
플랫폼 기반 비즈니스 전략 수립 업무 경험자 우대
파워포인트/엑셀 문서 작성 능통자 우대
영어 활용능력 우수자 우대
[ 전형절차]
1 차 서류 심사
2 차 실무/임원 면접
* 서류전형 합격자에 한하여 개별적으로 면접 일정 안내
[ 지원방법]

E-mail 지원
보내실 곳: Recruiting@kr.ey.com
제출 서류: 자사양식 이력서(입사지원서, 경력기술서, 자기소개서)
[ 다운로드 링크 : https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/15d5MA8vyLs221EmE1Y4eRpDbYm1lVCXI/edit?usp=sharing&ouid=105318437103252797478&rtpof=true&sd=true ]
첨부파일명과 메일 제목은 [FAAS_데이터전략_경력_성명]으로 기입 바랍니다.
위 사항을 충족하지 못할 경우, 접수가 정상적으로 처리되지 않을 수 있습니다.
[ 기타사항]
급여: 회사 내규에 따름
주 근무지: 서울 및 클라이언트 사이트
근무형태: 정규직
보안상의 이유로 메일 수신 확인이 어려울 수 있는 점 참조 바랍니다.
적합한 인력 채용 시 본 공고는 조기 마감될 수 있습니다
문의 : Recruiting@kr.ey.com
다른 position과 중복지원 불가
EY | Building a better working world

EY는 더 나은 업무 환경을 조성하여 고객과 사람 그리고 사회를 위한 장기적 가치를 형성하기 위해 힘쓰고 자본 시장의 신뢰를 구축하기 위해 존재합니다.

약150개국의 다양한 EY 팀은 데이터와 기술을 지원하여 자신감을 통한 신뢰를 구축하고 고객의 성장, 혁신 및 운영을 지원합니다.

보험, 컨설팅, 법률, 전략, 세금 및 거래 전반에서 일하며 EY 팀은 현재 세상이 직면하고 있는 복잡한 문제에 더 나은 질문을 던지고 새로운 답을 찾습니다.

title: Associate Product Manager (Home, Discovery and Personalization)
description:
The Personalization team focused on creating a personalized experience for our buyers. We want customers to feel as though we really know them, and accomplishing this requires us to understand their preferences, needs, and interests. We are responsible for the recommendation and content optimization that personalizes shopping experiences for all Tokopedia users.

We use machine learning to create customer-facing experiences that are delightful and engaging. This collaborative innovation is guided by thoughtful experimentation and a customer-obsessed pursuit to recommend the right item, to the right customer, at the right time. The features that we design, build, and scale are prominently placed and help millions of customers each day discover and purchase through the entire shopping experience.

What You Will Do
Drive product vision and prioritize roadmap for maximizing and optimizing homepage recommendations
Understand the needs of our customers. Determine customer insights using qualitative and quantitative methods.
Create Business Requirement Documents (BRD) and Product Requirement Documents (PRD) with clarity on objectives and execution details
Define and execute A/B experiments with cross-functional stakeholders
Identify, measure, and monitor product and business metrics to drive improvements and better understand customer needs
Establish a shared vision with all stakeholders to align the overall roadmap based on priority and effort needed

What You Will Need
1-3 years of relevant experience in Product Management
Previous experience working with recommendations and search products and have worked with machine learning and data scientist teams is preferred
Problem solver with a clear structure and analytical skills
Strong communication skills, both written and verbal, and influencing and negotiation skills
Proactive to making things happen and critical in ensuring progress
Be flexible and adapt to changing circumstances
Have the experience working in a multidisciplinary team environment
A degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or technical field is preferred

title: SVP Head of Quantitative Risk, Analytic, and Provisioning
description:
Indonesian|Consumer / Retail Banking


About Our Client

Leading International Bank (buku 2) with branches across Indonesia

Job Description

Oversight of Risk Quantitative & Rating, Provisioning, IFRS Modeling, Governance, and Risk modelling for Special Project within Risk Management function. Focusing on credit risk analytics, reporting, and model development to support risk and business in growing healthy portfolio.

Leading a team of risk analysts, IFRS 9 Project & Provisioning, and Risk modelling for Special Project. Responsible of effectively managing resources and talents. Providing guideline and framework for each team member and aligning each duty to the vision & mission of the company.Responsible for developing data-based analytics framework of credit risk (such as credit modelling, credit scoring, vintage analysis, reporting, etc) of Risk team through leveraging both internal and external data to support the Banks product growth via managing credit loss and building revenue.Responsible for IFRS 9 modelling: model review, monitoring, parameter, macroeconomic update, overlay and stress testing and provision related reporting to GroupResponsible for setting up governance under QRAP, which include provision policy and SOP as well as reporting SOPWork alongside with internal stakeholders (Risk team, Product, Marketing, Collection, Data Scientist, etc) on developing and implementing analytics framework by both reaching out and taking inputs from them. Including but not limited to ensuring proper risk analytics usage through good communication to partners, model implementation, periodic model validation, and ensuring valid & proper data quality for model inputsExploring potential external partners, and collaborate with external vendors and stakeholders, to build the risk analytics capabilities of the bank such as scorecard not limited to fraud system and decision engine.Reporting to Chief of Risk, keeping track of trend changes from data readings by going deep-dive into (statistical and empirical) readings on product dynamics and uncover potential hidden risks.Held accountable as part of the Risk team on the profit and loss of the product coming from credit decisions resulting from analytics worksHaving vision in preparing effective, efficient report in timely mannerFamiliar in preparing such reporting model ( some of items by automation prepared) :Quarterly Bank's Plan , Responsible for forecasting and simulating bank performance based on several different scenarios and economics condition.Monthly LLPC (Loan Loss Provision Committee) projection. Responsible for estimating end of month LIE (Loan Impairment Expense), and coordinate with stakeholders to ensure accuracy and appropriateness of the action plan.Responsible in preparing Regulatory Reporting. Fulfilling data and analysis requirements from regulators. Including, but not limited to preparing monthly reporting to regulator, provide analysis of bank conditions, forecast / estimate of bank's performance, etc.Monthly Internal Dashboard, a collection of information containing all performance data of lending products.Monthly Reporting group.Monthly Regular Reporting such as RMC, CPC, and PQR deck

The Successful Applicant

Overall minimum 10 years experience in Consumer/SME Risk analytic & modelling, with at least 6 years experience of managing team.Must have effective communication / presentations skills to all different stakeholders. Driving analytics / insights from data to drive business forward.Experience in building risk model, statistics, and model implementation will be desirableExperience in statistics/decision management, model development and implementation preferredAble to work under load and able to do both historical analysis as well as 'forward thinking' on building up risk analytics frameworkProgramming knowledge in SQL , SAS, and Preferably Python.Effective and efficient in preparing report. High proficiency in Excel and Powerpoint is preferred.Preferably having knowledge in IFRS 9 provisioning model

What's On Offer

Competitive package

Contact: Ben Ewbank

Quote job ref: 4214265

title: Risk Analytic and Modelling unit Head
description:
Job Description
Build credit risk modelling, analytics and reporting for retail customers and commercial customers.
Partner with the product team to determine how technology help to detect and reduce risk.
Analyze key metrics to determine risk.
Maintain the credit model platform which is utilized by the team and expected to provide advice and guidance on ongoing efficiency gains and new credit modelling methodology.
Supervise the development of the risk management database and analysis.
Lead the process of credit assessment enhancement through automation and machine learning development.
Conduct industry analysis and construct industry rating report to be given to the financing analyst team to support their financing assessment activities
Job Requirements
Experience as Data Scientist or Risk Modelling at least 5 years (preferably experience in fintech or startup).
Knowledge of programming languages and tools such as but not limited to SQL, Python, R.
Knowledge of a variety of machine learning techniques (clustering, decision tree learning, artificial neural networks, etc.) and their real-world advantages/drawbacks.
Experience in building credit risk and scoring model in banks or financial institutions.
Knowledge of advanced statistical techniques and concepts (regression, properties of distributions, statistical tests and proper usage, etc.) and experience with applications.
Ability to communicate complex data in a simple, actionable way

title: Technical Manager DE Advance Analytics
description:
Be a part of a revolutionary change

At PMI, we’ve chosen to do something incredible. We’re totally transforming our business and building our future on one clear purpose – to deliver a smoke-free future.

With huge change, comes huge opportunity. So, wherever you join us, you’ll enjoy the freedom to dream up and deliver better, brighter solutions and the space to move your career forward in endlessly different directions.

PMI’s journey to a smoke-free future is fueled by technology.

The total transformation we’re going through means that there are unique IT projects here to match all levels of skills and ambitions – from pace-setting global pilot projects to vital local updates. Whether you want to pursue a personal passion or build an international career, there’s space here to develop in any number of directions.

To join us in IT you’ll need to be driven and equally happy whether you’re taking the strategic view or diving deep into processes. We'll make sure you're set up to succeed whatever your project is, our culture is agile and collaborative, and we genuinely believe our people are some of the best you’ll ever work with.

Your Day to Day

Manage a team and capabilities that drive cutting edge AI/ML Platform solutions using cloud hybrid architecture and modern standards and patterns.
Be both highly technical and effective people manager
Drive ML platform roadmap creation and execution
Be a subject matter expert in MLE domain
Develop solutions or tools to monitor, provision components for automation of the processes, services and reports
Lead teams to create and enable end to end ML platform
Participate in technical design discussion with solution architect
Leverage strong leadership skills to develop impactful recommendations on industrialization of AI/ML products into capabilities that can be plugged into production environments across operational and analytical user landscape.
Who We Are Looking for

Education
Bachelor/Master degree in Engineering, Information Management or Information Technology,
Fluent English, both written and spoken
Work experience
Minimum 5 to 10 years in an data engineering or software engineer and advance analytic implementation
Minimum 3 to 5 years in a multinational corporate environment demonstrating exposure and/or expertise in machine learning platform enablement, either from technology or best practises point of view
Combining with Project Management would be a plHius.
Skills and expertise
Able to lead and motivate global cross-functional teams
Deep and broad knowledge of ML technology components and tool (preferably the combination of AWS, Snowflake and open source technology)
Familiar with machine learning concept and terminology, ability to enable data scientist team to follow the technical best practise and standard
Proven track record in implementing industry standards and best practices within AI/ML value chain using systems, software and data engineering best practices and tools - model training, MLOps, Feature Store, model serving and monitoring
Experience with application production readiness, production monitoring, and production issue triaging
Knowledge of industry standard software best practices, development lifecycle processes and Agile tools and methodologies.
Exhibits acute business acumen and understanding of organizational data issues and challenges
Leader who collaborates effectively across corporate and regions with strong influencing capabilities that can build consensus and drive change
Ability to think strategically while operating tactically to implement a global data platform stack
Storytelling ability using data and technology to communicate value and break barriers between Data Producers, Data Consumers, Data Engineers, Data Scientist, and Infrastructure teams
What we offer

Our success depends on our talented employees who come to work here every single day with a sense of purpose and an appetite for progress. Join PMI and you too can
Seize the freedom to define your future and ours. We’ll empower you to take risks, experiment and explore.
Be part of an inclusive, diverse culture, where everyone’s contribution is respected; collaborate with some of the world’s best people and feel like you belong.
Pursue your ambitions and develop your skills with a global business – our staggering size and scale provides endless opportunities to progress.
Take pride in delivering our promise to society to deliver a smoke-free future
To join our growing team…

title: Senior Product Manager
description:
As Product Manager you will be responsible for owning the entire product lifecycle from strategy to evaluation. You will also work cross-functionally to complete product roadmaps.

What you will do:
Lead a cross-functional team, partnering with other departments to ship high impact capabilities and product improvements driving efficiency.
Define, track and report on key product, business and customer metrics
Seek product ideas and feedback, gather requirements, write specs, create wireframes and workflows
Do a continuous research, both online and offline, to understand customer problems and identify and iterate on solutions
Define clear and well-scoped requirements documents that are easily understood by technical and non-technical audiences
Collaborate with internal stakeholders in support, marketing, operations, and business to develop go to market strategy, product messaging and training for a successful launch.

We're looking for someone who has:
A Bachelor’s / Masters or an equivalent degree, preferably in IT/IS engineering.
A minimum of 3 years of experience working as a product manager, ideally working on consumer-facing. Additional experience as a product analyst / data scientist / software engineer / consulting is a plus.
Independent and curious, you set your own targets and always looking to learn something new.
Experience in lead small member of people in product including junior product and UIUX designer.
Analytical and data-driven, you love digging into the data to understand what’s happening and define & measure success on every project. Fluency with numbers is a must.
You are comfortable to give a very high view of the roadmap and also simultaneously you are comfortable with talking about the details of finer nuances in the product.
You are comfortable with a research job to define the problem statements and getting in the depth of problem areas.
You’re passionate about your customers and always bring questions back to what will serve them best.
Ever using an agile development methodology is a plus.

Benefits
Hybrid working policies
Employee benefits free monthly OKHOME services
Mobile data package / pulsa (Reimburse)
Private insurance covering inpatient, outpatient and dental including family up to 3 children
Employee personal growth facilities from online course, books, e-learning and etc.
Laptop Ownership Program with company subsidy 30% , employee can purchase laptop for working tools with 0% installment (0-25 months period)
Monthly competitive incentives (eligible after 3 months review / passing probation)

And the most important is chances to make an impact by creating leveraging innovative solution through technology and human resources management. Build one application to fulfill home needs and creating more work opportunity for blue collar level!

description:

Minimum S1 majoring in Computer Science and other related fields, with minimum 3 years of work experience
Have work experience in the design, testing, and development and integration of applications or software
Understand and have experience in the ETL methodology
Familiar with using ETL tools
Knowledge of Javascript development and Responsive Web Design (HTML / HTML5, CSS / SCSS)
Knowledge in Data Warehouse & Big Data is a plus
Good knowledge with Web Services, REST API, JSON, HTTP specifications and web application architecture

Process ETL Data from start to finish
Testing solutions, especially applications in accordance with the business analyst's design.
Coordinate with Lead Developer for work implementation and work progress reporting

title: ETL DEVELOPER
description:
Company Description

Be a Part of Our Global Community!

Join the Game!

Leader in the development and publishing of games, Gameloft® has established itself as one of the top innovators in its field since 2000. Gameloft creates games for all digital platforms, two of which are featured in the “Top 10 iOS Games by All-Time Worldwide Downloads” from App Annie. Gameloft operates its own established franchises such as Asphalt®, Dragon Mania Legends, Modern Combat and Dungeon Hunter and also partners with major rights holders including Disney®, LEGO®, Universal, Illumination Entertainment, Marvel®, Hasbro®, Fox Digital Entertainment, Mattel®, Lamborghini® and Ferrari®. Gameloft distributes its games in over 100 countries and employs 4,300 people worldwide. Every month, 80 million unique users can be reached by advertisers in Gameloft games with Gameloft Advertising Solutions, a leading B2B offering dedicated to brands and agencies. Gameloft is a Vivendi company.

All trademarks referenced above are owned by their respective trademark owners.

Job Description

As member of DATA team, your responsibilities will be
Participate in the design and implementation of our ETL systems and data warehouse systems for new and existing projects
Provide support for existing applications as well as develop new features and updates
Maintain the existing systems, pipelines and aggregation processes
Monitor the data warehouse to ensure the performance, security and availability of the data to clients
Optimize data mining and data aggregation operations
Collaborate with members of the team to help them identify performance bottlenecks and suggest product improvements
Work with other team members to facilitate working with the data and extracting the data
Work closely with the teams that generate the data
Requirements

Qualifications
3+ years of experience with ETL/ELT
2+ years of experience with Python
Excellent SQL skills
Strong knowledge of data design, modeling, query, different architectures (row vs column), data warehouse
Experience working with raw data in various formats CSV, JSON, Parquet, etc.
Some of experience with Amazon Web Services
Knowledge of event driven and serverless architectures
Bachelor’s degree or equivalent in Computer Science, Information Management, Statistics, Mathematics or related field
Good English skills
Worked in large scales systems providing huge amounts of data.
Plus
experience with Spark (Pyspark preferred)
Experience with NoSQL solutions
Experience in web development (especially PHP)
Familiar with Jira, Confluence
Additional Information

Why join the Gameloft universe?
Because you want to be part of an exceptional experience, within a company that is constantly growing!
Because you want to work with talented people who are industry pioneers!
Because you want to join a global company and meet great people around the world from all walks of life.
Or, just because you’re looking for a great place to work!
What We Offer
Teamwork with international talents
Recognition and rewards
Creative and modern workplace
Continuous and professional training
Work hard, play hard
We can’t wait to find our next great talent!
Please submit your CV, cover letter or portfolio (if applicable)
Please note that only selected candidates will be contacted and your CV will be saved in our files for a period of 6 months.

title: ETL Developer
description:
At NTT we believe that by using innovative technology we can solve global challenges and create a world that is sustainable and secure. We are looking for curious people, from diverse backgrounds, that are keen to work in a fast-paced and agile environment.

At NTT we trust our employees to do the right thing, even when no one is watching, which is why we offer flexibility in the workplace. The majority of our roles are hybrid, meaning we encourage a balance of working from home and our local office. Ask our recruitment team if this is a hybrid role.

Want to be a part of our team?

Analyzes, designs, programs, debugs, and modifies software enhancements and/or new products used in local, networked, cloud-based, or Internet-related computer programs.

Code may be used in commercial or end-user applications, such as materials management, financial management, HRIS, mobile apps, or desktop applications products.

Using current programming language and technologies, writes code, completes programming, and performs testing and debugging of applications.

Completes documentation and procedures for installation and maintenance.

May interact with users to define system requirements and/or necessary modifications.

Working at NTT

The primary responsibility of the Software Applications Development Engineer is to develop new applications and improve upon existing ones that will our client and business needs.

Key Roles and Responsibilities:

Develop applications that effectively accomplish client objectives and user needs.

Design and write code for applications and maintain applications databases.

Analyze and edit existing software applications to improve and optimize functionality, fix problems, and enable their use on new hardware platforms.

Remodel and adapt applications as needed to optimize performance.

Identify specific customer and client needs and preferences related to the application.

Test applications extensively to ensure they are error and bug-free.

Install applications and act as technical advisor.

Communicate with relevant internal technical stakeholders to obtain information on project limitations, performance requirements, and interfaces.

Consult with clients in the design phase to determine client needs.

Produce software documentation following company software process and templates.

Participates in software product review meetings and team meetings.

Knowledge, Skills, and Attributes:
Broad understanding of computer science, with specific knowledge of computer programming, application design, and user-focused features
Creative problem solvers
Good interpersonal, communication, and organizational skills
Good team players and maintain the integrity and display good attention to detail
Ability to understand and analyze complex systems
Proficient in writing software using the Java Programming Language and a standard object library
Sound knowledge of software development process
Familiarity with agile development such as Scrum
Knowledge of software integrated development environments
Extensive knowledge in various programming languages (Java, Perl, Python, C++, etc.)
Demonstrated analytical, organizational, and project management skills, using relevant information to make timely and critical decisions that affect cross-functional teams
Ability to handle client and customer issues tactfully and professionally

Academic Qualifications and Certifications:
Bachelor's degree in computer science or software engineering
Relevant certifications

Required Experience:
Software Applications Engineering, Software Development experience, or related work experience
Experience with Programming Languages such as C, C++, Java, Python, etc.
Experienced with Linux or Unix and Windows operating systems
Experience working with SQL
Project management experience and/or experience working in an Agile environment

What will make you a good fit for the role?

Join our growing global team and accelerate your career with us. Apply today.

Equal opportunity employer

NTT is proud to be an equal opportunity employer with a global culture that embraces diversity. We are committed to providing an environment free of unfair discrimination and harassment. We do not discriminate based on age, race, color, sex, religion, national origin, disability, pregnancy, marital status, sexual orientation, gender reassignment, veteran status, or other protected category.

description:
Job Description
Design, Develop and Test ETL Mappings, Mapplets, Workflows, Worklets to support business requirements.
Perform feasibility, impact analysis and suitable solutions based on the use cases.
Ensuring data management and governance to maintain the data integrity.
Develop data mappings to extract the data from XML/Database and loading to the source stating database tables.
Create shell scripts for ETL purpose.

Bachelor degree in Computer Science, Information System or related field
At least 1 year of working experience in ETL Developer
Required skills: SQL/Database Oracle, ETL Tools (SSIS, Abinitio, Power BI, Tableau)
Good communication and fast learner
Excellent problem-solving skills

title: ETL Developer
description:
At NTT we believe that by using innovative technology we can solve global challenges and create a world that is sustainable and secure. We are looking for curious people, from diverse backgrounds, that are keen to work in a fast-paced and agile environment.

At NTT we trust our employees to do the right thing, even when no one is watching, which is why we offer flexibility in the workplace. The majority of our roles are hybrid, meaning we encourage a balance of working from home and our local office. Ask our recruitment team if this is a hybrid role.

Want to be a part of our team?

Analyzes, designs, programs, debugs, and modifies software enhancements and/or new products used in local, networked, cloud-based or Internet-related computer programs. Code may be used in commercial or end-user applications, such as materials management, financial management, HRIS, mobile apps or desktop applications products. Using current programming language and technologies, writes code, completes programming, and performs testing and debugging of applications. Completes documentation and procedures for installation and maintenance. May interact with users to define system requirements and/or necessary modifications.

Working at NTT

The primary responsibility of the ETL Developer is to develop new applications and improve upon existing ones that will our client and business needs.

Key Roles and Responsibilities:
Participates in gathering ETL requirements from business analysts and owners to produce requirements documents.
Developing database objects, and creates ETL processes.
Creates databases, table spaces, tables, indexes, triggers, procedures, and other database objects.
Helps define the content and structure of the database (schema) and advises users on efficient techniques for extracting data.
Works within defined content and structure of the database (schema).
Work with team to implement changes and provide post-implementation user support and system support.
Maintenance, health check, and application support on client site.
Identify specific customer and client needs and preferences related to the application.
Test applications extensively to ensure they are error and bug-free.
Install applications and act as technical advisor.
Communicate with relevant internal technical stakeholders to obtain information on project limitations, performance requirements, and interfaces.
Consult with clients in the design phase to determine client needs.
Produce software documentation following company software process and templates.
Participates in software product review meetings and team meetings.

Knowledge, Skills, and Attributes:
Excellent trouble shooting and analysis skills
Able to face client to do application support
Able to work in team
Able to work under pressure
Broad understanding of computer science, with specific knowledge of computer programming, application design, and user-focused features
Creative problem solvers
Good interpersonal, communication, and organizational skills
Good team players and maintain the integrity and display good attention to detail
Sound knowledge of software development process
Familiarity with agile development such as Scrum
Knowledge of software integrated development environments

Academic Qualifications and Certifications:
Bachelor Degree in Computer Science or similar fields

Required Experience:
1 – 2 years of experience developing, maintaining and administering RDBMS including creating and updating scripts, procedures, or queries in SQL
Hands on ETL experience with complicated coding and maintenance in any ETL tools (i.e. Informatica Power Centre, SSIS, Pentaho, etc )
Experience with Programming Languages such as C, C++, Java, Python, etc.
Experienced with Linux or Unix and Windows operating systems is an advantage
Experience working with SQL is an advantage
Proficient in writing software using the Java Programming Language and a standard object library

What will make you a good fit for the role?

Applies company policy and procedures to resolve routine tasks
Gets detailed work instructions

Solutions to problems are easy to solve

title: ETL Developer
description:
Job Description:

- Creates and enhances data solutions.
- Consulting with data management teams to get a big-picture idea of the company’s data storage needs.
- Presenting the company with warehousing options based on their storage needs.
- Designing and coding the data warehousing system to desired company specifications.
- Conducting preliminary testing of the warehousing environment before data is extracted.
- Extracting company data and transferring it into the new warehousing environment.
- Testing the new storage system once all the data has been transferred.
- Troubleshooting any issues that may arise.
- Providing maintenance support.

Job Requirement:

- Min. 1-2 years experience as ETL developer.
- Knowledge and experience working with database queries.
- Knowledge of ETL (SSIS, Informatica, Talend, Pentaho, etc)
- Strong analytical skill and problem-solving skills.

title: Freelance Consultant
description:
Hello candidates

My name is Monaliza, Recruiter Coordinator GPS United

We are looking to hire ambitious 3-5 years experienced employees or fresh graduates who are in search of opportunity for full time/part time career (second career) in sales and financial business partnership

With us, you’ll do meaningful work from Day 1. Our collaborative culture is built on three core behaviors: We Play to Win, We Get Better Every Day & We Succeed Together. And we mean it — we want you to grow and make a difference in your life impact. We value what makes you unique so that you have an opportunity to shine.

Come build your future, while being the reason millions of people find a brighter financial future with our program

In this Program, you can have learning experience more in business development, people development, sales and marketing skills, communication skills, interpersonal skills, financial literacy, digital marketing world, leading a team, and of course digital personal branding

What you will be doing :

Identifying and developing business relationships in a competitive environment
Assessing and responding to the needs of each particular client
Generating leads and meeting sales goals
Networking to build business information that can be converted into commercial opportunities
Approaching prospective clients and converted it to business
Partnering with business leaders to drive strategic business growth and build your expertise

Our Requirements:

Interested in Sales Marketing World (this is really important)
Interested in becoming an entrepreneur
Interested in contacting and building relationship with new people and new business partner
Interested in Digital Sales Marketing and Personal Branding in Social Media
Interested in people development and business development
Interested in Financial Literacy and Risk Management
Ready to learn and working out of current comfort zone to earn new skills, new knowledge and new journey
Ready to WFH/Remote (have laptop and internet) and also ready for offline activities at Jakarta Office
Have good time management
Have a good appearance
Available to work comfortably in a fast paced environment

We offered you:

Allowance and Commission, based on your performance
Opportunity to be developed and promoted to be an Account Manager/Senior Account Manager
One on One Coaching
Training and Mentoring

This job vacancy is open to all province in Indonesia, as long as you have internet connection, you can join our zoom session on time

send your cv to : recruit.gpsagency@gmail.com

title: Product Specialist
description:
Apply on our website

About Impact Impact is a technology and consulting company specializing in digital transformation with the vision to grow Indonesia's economy through helping businesses and the workforce through software, data, education, and community. We are a lean company (and will continue to be) with a flat organizational structure, yet we wish to maximize our impact for our nation and eventually the world. Therefore our philosophy is to be (and we are looking for people who are) data-driven, able to identify the real pain points (which is surprisingly hard), and can come up with out-of-the-box yet practical permanent solutions. Data, brainstorming, and research are essential to live what we preach, so people who are open-minded, goal-oriented, independent yet good team players, humble, and have clear vision and tenacity tend to fit us better. Somehow, people who care about social impact also tend to fit us better, although we still don’t know why.

Life at Impact You will work in cross-functional teams and meet great people regularly from diverse backgrounds. We work in an open environment where there are no boundaries or power distance. Everyone is encouraged to speak their mind, propose ideas, influence others, and continuously grow themselves.

Purpose and Mission Associate Product Manager role at ImpactFirst provides a unique opportunity to be at the center of building business software to solve Indonesian businesses problems. It’s a blend of technical, creative, analytical, and leadership role in driving successful products or features from conception to completion. You will contribute to researching, defining, prototyping, and driving the construction, as well as managing communication with engineering, marketing, finance, and operations stakeholders and external contacts to ensure smooth delivery of the project. Throughout your time as an Associate Product Manager, you will learn and grow at a tremendous pace through hands-on experience.

You'll Help us to: Translate product strategy into product plan, detailed requirements, and prototypes. Work collaboratively with Engineering, Marketing, Sales, Customer Support and UIUX teams to implement new features and enhancements. Able to independently do complex analysis, identify additional relevant data points and extract insight to obtain understanding of the competitive landscape, customers, product metrics, and latest trends. Supportively collaborate with Engineering team during sprinting and development

The Qualification Bachelor graduate preferably from Actuarial Studies/Engineering/Computer Science/Business/Information System or equivalent major with min. GPA 3.5 of 4.00

Passionate about building a product that people want and will solve real business problems 0-3 years of hands on experience in related product field (ERP/POS/Manufacture) Must have traits: Dependable with excellent adaptability, data-driven, startup, growth mindset and think outside the box. Get things done

What’s Great in This Job Remote working option Interesting projects and people. Startup culture with direct coordination with C-level for objective and follow-ups. Large tech product and chances to learn large scope of knowledge. Support of a real usability and testing team. Great team of smart people, in a supportive, casual, and open working environment.

description:
At Deloitte, we offer a unique and exceptional career experience to inspire and empower talents like you to make an impact that matters for our clients, people and society. Whatever your aspirations, Deloitte offers you unrivalled opportunities to realize your full potential. We are always looking for people with the relentless energy to push themselves further, and to find new avenues and unique ways to reach our shared goals.

Work you will do

This role sits within the Technology Strategy and Transformation (TS&T) team of Deloitte Southeast Asia, which encompasses IT Strategy and Transformation. As a leader of this group, you will drive the growth of our TS&T business in the region and be responsible for the creation, sale and delivery of TS&T solutions: IT Strategy, Application & Systems Development, IT Business Transformation, etc.

title: Business Analyst
description:
Company Description: Bobobox Pods Dago berlokasi di salah satu daerah yang paling happening di Bandung. Dekat dengan pusat distro fashionable Bandung, Bobobox Pods Dago bisa menjadi pilihan yang tepat untuk berlibur sambil berbelanja. Dikelilingi dengan kuliner-kuliner sedap, pengunjung dapat menikmati liburan di Bandung yang sempurna tanpa harus melakukan perjalanan jauh. Job Description:

The Business Development team at Bobobox will grow significantly in the year of 2021 by implementing and supporting business information systems across multiple departments. A Business Analyst has to identify problems and opportunities within a company and ultimately provide solutions that help achieve the business’s goals, especially in the area of pipeline growth.

The Business Analyst at Bobobox will report to the Business Strategy Manager. Business analyst will be expected to build market analysis, analyzing both the product compatibility, profitability, and feasibility of the businesses. This role includes doing things like maintaining a database for site acquisition process, build location classification and grading, and also build financial projections for Bobobox’s next locations. Business Analyst also need to have strong knowledge to develop and maintain SOP in the internal department. Maintaining good relationships and coordinations with cross functional departments such as Finance, Legal, Architect and Site Project Team is crucial.

Things you will do
Build feasibility study for new potential locations.
Creating detailed business analysis, outlining problems, opportunities and solutions for a business
Defining business requirements in liaison with Business Development Associate
Create financial projection and also develop new financial arrangement / schemes with various stakeholders of the business, especially project investors.
Maintain master data and database for site acquisition process
Prepare and maintain SOP in Business Development department

title: Business Development Associate
description:
Hello candidates..

My name is Riana a Recruiter Coordinator GPS United..

We are looking to hire ambitious 3-5 years experienced employees or fresh graduates who are in search of opportunity for full time/part time career (second career) in sales and financial business partnership

With us, you’ll do meaningful work from Day 1. Our collaborative culture is built on three core behaviors: We Play to Win, We Get Better Every Day & We Succeed Together.

And we mean it — we want you to grow and make a difference in your life impact.

We value what makes you unique so that you have an opportunity to shine.

Come build your future, while being the reason millions of people find a brighter financial future with our program

In this Program, you can have learning experience more in business development, people development, sales and marketing skills, communication skills, interpersonal skills, financial literacy, digital marketing world, leading a team, and of course digital personal branding

What you will be doing :

Identifying and developing business relationships in a competitive environment

Assessing and responding to the needs of each particular client

Generating leads and meeting sales goals

Networking to build business information that can be converted into commercial opportunities

Approaching prospective clients and converted it to business

Partnering with business leaders to drive strategic business growth and build your expertise

Our Requirements:

Interested in Sales Marketing World (this is really important)

Interested in contacting and building relationship with new people and new business partner

Interested in Digital Sales Marketing and Personal Branding in Social Media

Interested in people development and business development

Interested in Financial Literacy and Risk Management

Ready to learn and working out of current comfort zone to earn new skills, new knowledge and new journey

Ready to WFH/Remote (have laptop and internet)

Have good time management

Have a good appearance

Available to work comfortably in a fast paced environment

We offered you:

Allowance and Commission, based on your performance

Opportunity to be developed and promoted to be an Account Manager/Senior Account Manager

One on One Coaching

Training and Mentoring

This job vacancy is open to Jakarta Metropolitan Area, as long as you have internet connection, you can join our zoom session on time

Pls send your CV & Photo to email : priscilla_riana99@yahoo.com

Best Regards,

Riana Sudarnoto
Agency Director
PT. GPS United

title: Consultant - Cloud Engineer - ID
description:
At Deloitte, we offer a unique and exceptional career experience to inspire and empower talents like you to make an impact that matters for our clients, people and community. Deloitte offers you a highly inclusive, collaborative workplace and unrivalled opportunities to realize your full potential. We are always looking for people with the relentless energy to push themselves further, and to find new avenues and unique ways to reach our shared goals.

Work you will do

Cloud is transforming the way technology enables the business. It represents a radical shift in how IT services are obtained, used, and managed. Companies are navigating through the various cloud options and deciding between private, public, or a combination across different and dynamic provider ecosystems. Our cloud specialists guide our clients through multi-year journeys from the case for change through implementation across all dimensions of cloud - business alignment, technology architecture and design, cloud application on-boarding, and transforming their operating model – to help solve our client’s most complex issues with the focus on value creation.

Our practitioners work collaboratively within integrated, cross-functional teams to deliver comprehensive strategies that enable Cloud and Infrastructure transformations. Teamwork is crucial as teams are composed of a diverse group of specialists across multiple disciplines from both within our consulting practice and from our clients, helping drive towards a successful outcome. Our practitioners are expected to own and deliver their respective deliverables while managing different clients and other stakeholders.

In partnership with other leaders in the firm, you will focus on selling and delivering cloud solutions using AWS. As Cloud Architect, you will you will drive the design and delivery of world-class cloud solutions for our clients, providing expertise on cloud infrastructure services including design, build and migrate. This includes taking a lead role in the cloud architecture and engineering practice. You will be challenged to find approaches that enable rapid adoption of new cloud services and drive transformation for our client’s business and IT processes.
You will perform primary and secondary research, conduct analyses and appropriate modelling tasks that feeds directly into the development of technology-enabled solutions for tackling our clients’ complex business problems.
You will leverage on your training in technology, utilize analytical abilities and communication skills to support the project teams in delivery of our digital solution architectures and in development of work products that addresses our clients’ business needs and help achieve their strategic goals.
You will support the project teams in developing presentation materials and in coordination of communications with the client.
You will assist the project teams in delivery of business-driven, technology-enabled solutions to help our clients meet pressing challenges and seize opportunities in their respective markets.
You will work with diverse and talented project team members to solve problems, improve performance, and generate value for our clients across all industries.
You will uphold the firm’s standards and ethos in working with fellow team members and in your interactions with the clients.
You will support business development efforts by contributing directly to the preparation, development of proposals, presentations and publications.
Enough About Us, Let's Talk About You

If you are someone with:
A good honors Degree, preferably at postgraduate level, in Information Technology, Business Information Systems, Business, Engineering, Mathematics or related disciplines.
Consultant will require a minimum of 4 years of experience in solution architecture covering three or more of Outsystems & integration and deployment.
AWS certification (at least Solution Architect – Associate level), or Google, Azure equivalent is preferred. The candidate will have a thorough understanding, familiarity and experience with Amazon Web Services, Google Cloud Platform or Microsoft Azure
Innovative and ability to think outside the box for creative problem solving
Experience playing the role of a Product Owner, Agile Coach, Scrum-of-Scrum Master, and/or Scrum Master
Experience working in an Agile/Scrum environment
Basic knowledge of AWS and other Cloud providers (Azure, GCP) Cloud services
Willingness to research and self-study to keep skills relevant in a complex and dynamic environment
Mentors and coaches colleagues and seeks opportunities for continuous improvement
Comfortable working in cross functional and multidisciplinary teams ability to work independently and as part of a team ability to multi-task and prioritize deadlines
Excellent verbal and written communication skills with great attention to detail and accuracy
Next Steps

So what are you waiting for? Join the winning team now.

Due to volume of applications, we regret only shortlisted candidates will be notified.

title: Business Development Consultant
description:
Work Life Balance|Exposure to different types of client


About Our Client

Michael Page is the worlds most respected professional recruitment consultancy. Ranked by Forbes as one of the top global professional services, and in 2017, we are recognized by Linked In as the Most Socially Engaged Recruitment Company

Our Jakarta (Indonesia) office began operations in 2013 and has grown to be a leading recruiter of choice for top tiered companies and experienced professionals. Comprising of specialist consultants who know the sector inside-out, our Finance team has represented leading clients in the industry for their recruitment needs and successfully helped place professionals across the various industry focuses.

Job Description

Act as a specialist consultant, which entails identifying market landscape, business development, and securing partnership in a competitive environment.
Maintain good relationship with existing clients and consistently develop relationship with new client
Headhunting - identifying and approaching suitable candidates who may already be in work using candidate databases to match the right person to the client's vacancy
Receiving and reviewing applications, managing interviews and tests and creating a shortlist of candidates for the client
Advising clients to add value to the recruitment and talent development process
Networking to build business information that can be converted into commercial opportunities
The Successful Applicant

Bachelor degree in reputable University
Professional English skill in both verbal and written is a MUST
Minimum 2 years of professional experience in either consulting, finance, accounting, or business development/sales
Diligent, proactive, energetic, smart, honest, mature and has good sense of Finance knowledge
Self-motivated, driven, and a willingness to always keep learning

What's On Offer

Work Life Balance
Exposure to different types of client
Fast-paced and dynamic work environment

Cloud is transforming the way technology enables the business. It represents a radical shift in how IT services are obtained, used, and managed. Companies are navigating through the various cloud options and deciding between private, public, or a combination across different and dynamic provider ecosystems. Our cloud specialists guide our clients through multi-year journeys from the case for change through implementation across all dimensions of cloud - business alignment, technology architecture and design, cloud application on-boarding, and transforming their operating model – to help solve our client’s most complex issues with the focus on value creation.

title: Consultant - Engineering and Manufacturing
description:
Own and develop your market|Work with the world's biggest brands


About Our Client

PageGroup is a leading professional recruitment consultancy specializing in the recruitment of permanent, contract and temporary positions for the world's top companies. Established in London in 1976, we've been bringing the world's best employers and brightest professionals together for over 35 years. More than 5,000 employees in 36 countries can be proud of their part in our global success, including giving something back to their local communities. An organically grown business, we are passionate about career progression and offer our people unrivalled talent development programmes. Rewarding success, having fun and working in a business that supports personal wellbeing is vital to the growth of our global team.

Our team in Indonesia is our fastest growing team which we have grown from scratch. We proudly work to match the brightest professionals with some of the world's biggest multinational brands and industry leaders, as well as some of the most highly respected local and international companies in Indonesia. Our commitment to career development has made us one of a handful of companies where all of our directors and above in Asia have been promoted from within.

Job Description

Your role involves more than just bringing the best employers and brightest professionals together.
You will also act as a specialist consultant, adding value to the recruitment process through your industry knowledge and experience.
You will provide career coaching to help job seekers find their next role and offer expert advice to clients on topics such as market conditions, trends and salary levels.
Advising clients to add value to the recruitment and talent development process
Provide career coaching to help job seekers find their next role and offer expert advice to clients on topics such as market conditions, trends and salary levels
Networking to build business information that can be converted into commercial opportunities
The Successful Applicant

We will consider any experience and any background, however any successful candidate must possess:
University degree in Engineering/Business/Marketing
Minimum 2 years of experience working in Manufacturing Industry or Processing Plant or FMCG.
Strong and proven track record in sales, networking and/or client development abilities
Thrive in a fast pace environment
Excellent time management and organisational skills
Strong commercial business acumen
A passionate desire to succeed and build a successful career
A winning mentality
The ability to overcome objection and be persistent
Overseas graduates with a few years of sales/account management experience are highly encouraged to apply
Strong interpersonal skills are also welcome to apply
What's on Offer

We provide unlimited international career opportunity within our worldwide network of offices. You will receive development throughout your career and work with a dynamic team that are proud and passionate about what they do and enjoy having fun too!
Excellent basic salary and quarterly bonus
20 days annual leave, rising to 25 days as a manager
Industry leading training throughout your career
World class training and development
Fast track into management opportunities - we have a 100% organically grown management team in Indonesia
Global career opportunities
The opportunity to develop and lead a business unit.
Contact: Felix Gustaf

title: Cloud Solution Architect - Digital & App Innovation
description:
With over 17,000 employees worldwide, the Microsoft Customer Experience & Success (CE&S) organization is responsible for the strategy, design, and implementation of Microsoft’s end-to-end customer experience. Come join CE&S and help us build a future where customers come to us not only because we provide industry-leading products and services, but also because we provide a differentiated and connected customer experience.

Are you someone who believes in making software development accessible to all? Would you love to help us accelerate customer’s digital transformation? Are you excited to become part of the next generation of technical leaders at Microsoft?

We are looking for a highly motivated and experienced Cloud Solution Architect (CSA) to help our customers accelerate time to value and drive rapid digital experiences. In this customer facing role, you will own the technical strategy, customer engagements including architectural design sessions, specific implementation projects and/or pilots and help them realize value with the Microsoft modern application framework, tools and technologies.

Responsibilities

The ideal candidate will have experience in customer-facing roles and success leading deep technical architecture discussions with senior customer executives, Enterprise Architects, IT Management and Developers.
Understanding Customer/Partner Technical Environment: Understand customers' overall applications portfolio, IT and business priorities and success measures to map, design and implement architectures and solutions (Microsoft and 3rd party solutions) accelerating digital transformation.
Technical Leadership: Apply Microsoft tools and cloud technical knowledge and customer insights to create an application modernization roadmap and rapid applications deployments for our enterprise customers. Apply broad technical, industry, and enterprise knowledge to architecture projects to meet business and information technology (IT) requirements and resolve identified constraints. shaping and enhancing cloud portfolio and functionalities. Lead enteriprise customer conversations to help implement technical architecture(s) to enable a breadth of highly advanced and complex solutions. Provides thought leadership for technical architecture design, development, and deployment and supports/drives the enterprises'  throughout pre,post sales and/or implementation.
Architecture Design and Deployment: Architect Frameworks, reusable components and solutions to meet business and IT needs, ensuring technical envisioning and proof of concepts for new projects and successful deployments, infusing key governance and security frameworks (g., Centre of excellence (COE), landing zone accelerators and ALM), and Application Development and DevOps technologies (e.g. APIM, Functions, ADO, GitHub etc.)
Trusted advisor: As a deep technical advisor, proactively resolve blockers by providing pro-active support as well as technical readiness to customers. Develop deep relationships with key customer IT decision makers, Professional Developers and Citizen Developer teams who drive long-term cloud adoption within their company to enable them to be cloud advocates. Be the Voice of the Customer; Share insights and best practices and connect with Engineering teams to remove key blockers.
Consumption (Cloud & Support) growth: Lead resiliency reviews, technical optimization to ensure all solutions deployed exhibit high levels of performance, security, scalability and increase customer business value. Drives efforts to ensure that the customer's environment and applications are well-architected.
Qualifications

Required/Minimum Qualifications
Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, Engineering, or related field AND 6+ years experience in technology solutions, practice development, architecture, consulting, and/or cloud/infrastructure technologies
OR Master's Degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, Engineering, or related field AND 4+ years experience in technology solutions, practice development, architecture, consulting, and/or cloud/infrastructure technologies
OR equivalent experience.
Additional Or Preferred Qualifications
Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, Engineering, or related field AND 10+ years experience in technology solutions, practice development, architecture, consulting, and/or cloud/infrastructure technologies
OR Master's Degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, Engineering, or related field AND 8+ years experience in technology solutions, practice development, architecture, consulting, and/or cloud/infrastructure technologies
OR equivalent experience.
4+ years technical sales experience.
4+ years project management experience.
Technical Certification in Cloud (e.g., Azure).
Professional
Experience: 8+ years of success in either consulting, cloud application architecture and competitive landscape. Enterprise-scale technical experience with Microsoft Azure, architecture capabilities, implementation requirements, integrations, and future roadmap.
Enterprise Application development Knowledge: Experience and understanding of large-scale application portfolios in enterprise-wide environments (including migration of on-premise workloads to the cloud)
Subject matter expertise in one or more of the following:
Software design, development and deployment for one or more of the following platforms: Web application server technologies, Cloud applications, mobile (Android, iOS), Linux, Windows.
DevOps practices, including continuous planning/Agile, CI/CD, quality and security and one of the DevOps tool chains (i.e, Azure DevOps, GitHub).
One or more of the following programming languages: C++, C#, Java, Node.js, JSON, PHP, Python.
Experience with scalable architectures using Azure App Service, API management, serverless technologies, container orchestration (e.g. Kubernetes, Cloud Foundry etc.), API management, Microservice frameworks etc.
Experience using integrated development environments (e.g. Visual Studio, Visual Studio Code, Eclipse, XCode, WebSphere) targeting Android, iOS, Linux, Windows, public clouds (i.e. Azure, AWS, Google)
Understanding of Low code platform and technologies such as Power App
Competitive Landscape. Knowledge of cloud development platforms.
Understanding of partner ecosystems and the ability to leverage partner solutions to solve customer needs.
Cerification in one or more Azure technologies AND/OR Cloud Specialization in one of key areas: App Innovation, Data & Analytics & AI, Infrastructure & Security
Partners Ecosystem Knowledge: Understanding of partner ecosystems and the ability to leverage partner solutions to solve customer needs.
Microsoft is an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to age, ancestry, color, family or medical care leave, gender identity or expression, genetic information, marital status, medical condition, national origin, physical or mental disability, political affiliation, protected veteran status, race, religion, sex (including pregnancy), sexual orientation, or any other characteristic protected by applicable laws, regulations and ordinances. We also consider qualified applicants regardless of criminal histories, consistent with legal requirements. title: Product Project Manager
description:
Are you looking for a supportive, collaborative workplace with great teams and inspiring leaders? You’ve come to the right place. We’re looking for ambitious people who share our values and want to make every day better for people around the world. If this sounds like you, and the career below sounds exciting, we’d like to hear from you.

Working Arrangement

Hybrid

Job Description

The opportunity

The customer is the focus of everything we do, and millions of end users rely on our products daily. We are seeking an experienced and self motivated Project Manager who can deliver on our strategic priorities, obsess about customers, and are excited to see the successful implementation of the projects/products they deliver.

Manulife Indonesia Product Project Management is accountable for delivering project related insurance products across distribution channels within time, budget and quality measurement.

What motivates you?
You obsess about customers, listen, engage and act for their benefit.
You think big, with curiosity to discover ways to use your agile approach and enable business outcomes.
You thrive in teams and enjoy getting things done together.
You take ownership and build solutions, focusing on what matters.
You do what is right, work with integrity and speak up.
You share your humanity, helping us build a diverse and inclusive work environment for everyone.
What We Are Looking For
University Degree (Management/Business Information System)
Have similar experience in project management min. 2 years
Have working experience in life insurance industry min. 2 years
Strong of verbal and written communication skill
Adequate of interpersonal skill
Strong of analytical and problem-solving skill
Adequate of organizational skill
Adequate of negotiation skill
Language: Bahasa Indonesia and English
Know and understand on how to use Microsoft Office, especially excel
On the job you will
Ensure that prescribed project management methodologies, appropriate approaches and project development life cycle phases are utilized in the delivery of project deliverables
Communicate and collaborate within and across the organization for input on priorities, approach, and solution designs
Maintain accurate status reporting and ensure proper project governance, such as project documentation
Identify when project(s) appear to be deviating from plan and develop effective remedies for brining project(s) back on schedule when required. Raise issues early and prepare options to resolve/remediate include assessment on the potential impact and risk
Lead and assist project team members with complex items and recommend resolutions to potential issues
What can we offer you?
A competitive salary and benefits packages.
A growth trajectory that extends upward and outward, encouraging you to follow your passions and learn new skills.
A focus on growing your career path with us.
Flexible work policies and strong work-life balance.
Professional development and leadership opportunities.
Our commitment to you
Values-first culture We lead with our Values every day and bring them to life together.
Boundless opportunity We create opportunities to learn and grow at every stage of your career.
Continuous innovation We invite you to help redefine the future of financial services.
Delivering the promise of Diversity, Equity and Inclusion We foster an inclusive workplace where everyone thrives.
Championing Corporate Citizenship We build a business that benefits all stakeholders and has a positive social and environmental impact.
Every career at Manulife/John Hancock provides the opportunity to learn new skills and move your career forward. Ready to make an impact somewhere? What are you waiting for? Apply today.

About John Hancock And Manulife

John Hancock is a unit of Manulife Financial Corporation, a leading international financial services group that helps people make their decisions easier and lives better. We operate primarily as John Hancock in the United States, and Manulife globally, including Canada, Asia and Europe. We provide financial advice, insurance and wealth and asset management solutions for individuals, groups and institutions. Assets under management and administration by Manulife and its subsidiaries were CAD$1.3 trillion (US$1.1 trillion) as of June 30, 2021. Manulife Financial Corporation trades as MFC on the TSX, NYSE, and PSE, and under 945 on the SEHK. Manulife can be found at manulife.com.

One of the largest life insurers in the United States, John Hancock supports more than 10 million Americans with a broad range of financial products, including life insurance, annuities, investments, 401(k) plans, and education savings plans. Additional information about John Hancock may be found at johnhancock.com.

Manulife is an Equal Opportunity Employer

At Manulife/John Hancock, we embrace our diversity. We strive to attract, develop and retain a workforce that is as diverse as the customers we serve and to foster an inclusive work environment that embraces the strength of cultures and individuals. We are committed to fair recruitment, retention, advancement and compensation, and we administer all of our practices and programs without discrimination on the basis of race, ancestry, place of origin, colour, ethnic origin, citizenship, religion or religious beliefs, creed, sex (including pregnancy and pregnancy-related conditions), sexual orientation, genetic characteristics, veteran status, gender identity, gender expression, age, marital status, family status, disability, or any other ground protected by applicable law.

It is our priority to remove barriers to provide equal access to employment. A Human Resources representative will work with applicants who request a reasonable accommodation during the application process. All information shared during the accommodation request process will be stored and used in a manner that is consistent with applicable laws and Manulife/John Hancock policies. To request a reasonable accommodation in the application process, contact recruitment@manulife.com.

title: Consulting - Business Transformation Senior Manager
description:
As a Senior Manager in our Consulting team you will deliver client service excellence, build positive client relationship and develop your team’s skills and capabilities.

Your Key Responsibilities
Take responsibility for managing the project teams and will be accountable for all work products developed by the project teams
Manage teams and provide directions to the project teams in undertaking current business assessments, analyzing best practice of the industry, develop recommendations and advise on appropriate strategies, governance, architecture, and innovations to optimize client’s business operations.
Help our clients to solve their most critical business and technological challenges by providing oversight and directing project teams in research efforts and analytics to develop and deliver innovative solutions.
Work closely with senior-level stakeholders to provide status updates and progress reports on project deliverables.
Lead the delivery of FGDs/ workshops with the client, as well as provide subject matter expertise in addressing issues that may be raised during key presentations.
Set up project plan including budget and resource allocation, manage and track project economics in accordance to the approved pricing parameters.
Take responsibility for management of project teams and will mentor team members to help them in their career progression.
Become a trusted advisor to our clients and will work closely with them in shaping major business transformation program and identify business opportunities ahead of the curve.
Lead the development of proposals, presentations and publications in response to market demands.
Lead teams to deliver impact to clients through the project by using a business-oriented mindset and use data-driven solutions to drive transformation agenda and achieve results
Influence teams and individuals positively by becoming a role model and provide equal opportunity for people to grow, develop and succeed.
Delivers exceptional client service by maximizes results and drives high performance from people while fostering collaboration across businesses and geographies.
Manage diverse teams within a highly inclusive team culture where people are respected and valued for their contribution.
Develop high-performing teams through challenging and meaningful opportunities and recognize them for the impact that they make.

Skills And Attributes For Success

To qualify for the role you must have:
A good honors of Bachelor Degree, preferably at postgraduate level, in Economy, Accounting, Information Technology, Business Information Systems, Business, Engineering, Mathematics or related disciplines.
Senior Manager will require a minimum of 11 years of experience in management consulting.
Experienced in both consulting projects as well as implementation experiences in the following areas:
Business/ IT Strategy: Business/ IT strategy development, enterprise architecture and IT governance and operating model
Business/ Digital Transformation: Program and project management advisory, business process reengineering, policies and procedures development
Business operation excellence program
Business/ IT Optimization and continuous improvement
Understanding specific industry trends and best practices.
Understanding of current IT trends (cloud computing, big data, RPA, IoT, blockchain, etc.) would be a plus.
Certifications in the relevant frameworks is required (PMP, PMBOK, CMMI, COBIT, Scrum Master or TOGAF)
Strong analytical skills, excellent oral/ written communication skills and presentation skills in English.
Be self-motivated, and able to work under stressful situations with changing priorities.
Possess drive and tenacity, and be client focused and results oriented.
Excellent problem solving skills, ability to think out-of-the-box, work under pressure and tight project timelines.
Proven demonstration of sound business acumen, teamwork and leadership qualities.
Willingness to work outside of office base and regular office hour.

If you can demonstrate that you meet the criteria above, please contact us as soon as possible.

description:
